298b1(khri brgyad): gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i chos gang yang mdo zhes bka' stsal pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba'i chos can mya ngan las 'das pa yang sprul pa lags par 'gyur ro// bka' stsa
298b2(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor de de bzhi te// de de bzhi no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ de dag ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/ ring sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byang
298b3(khri brgyad): chub sadel sanga' chen po rnams kyis ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa gang
298b4(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa yi no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das su
298b5(khri brgyad): dang po pa'i gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yo su 'tshal bar bgyi na// ji ltar gdams shing rje sub snyan par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rang 'byor ci ts+tshan
298b6(khri brgyad): dngos po yod par gyur la/ phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam/ rab 'byor 'di la dngos po yang med/ dngos po med pa yang med/ rang gi dngos po yang med/ gzhan gyi dngos po
298b7(khri brgyad): yang med na/ de la gang yongasu shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par gal 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las chos nyid 'gyur ba med
298b8(khri brgyad): par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// bam po lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sede byams pas zhus pa/ brjes byang chub
299a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sade' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la smod par 'tshal bas// gzugs la ji lta ru bslab par brgya
299a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab pa ra g+hi/ mig gi skye mched dang / na ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / sgo'i skye mtshad
299a3(khri brgyad): lus kyi skye mched dang / lid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched
299a4(khri brgyad): chos kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi kha mas dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams pa
299a5(khri brgyad): sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / 'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang
299a6(khri brgyad): rag bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ mig gi
299a7(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ 'du
299a8(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / rig pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skyo ba dang / rga shil ji ltar bslab

300a1(khri brgyad): pa ma mchis pa dang / mi sdug pa'i chos rnams dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / bdag med pa rnams la ji ltar bslab par bsti/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / nyon mo
300a2(khri brgyad): pa spangs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ de skad
300a3(khri brgyad): ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sengar byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub se der soda' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub
300a4(khri brgyad): sede'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas gzugs ming tsa mo zhes bya bar bslab par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam sa dang / rnam par shes pa ming tsamo zhes bya ba nas

300a6(khri brgyad): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'di lta ste gzugs shes bgyi ba'i ming 'di ni/ dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
300a7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa nas 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan mnya
300a8(khri brgyad): bar gzung ste dngos po dang bcas par dmigs pa lags na// ji ltar byang chub ses gzugs ming tsa mo zhes bgyi bar bsla par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
300b1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba ni ming tsa mo zhes bgyi ba nas sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyi bar du mi tsa mo zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ dngos po ma mchi su lags na
300b2(khri brgyad): de'i ming de yang ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lags te/ 'di lta ste gzugs shes bgyi ba ni ming tsam kho na zhes bgyir mi rung lag so// 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

300b4(khri brgyad): mi rung lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'ang sa kyis byang chub seM de byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed

301a1(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la glo bur du ming du btag so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po sa

301a8(khri brgyad): pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang des gzugs shes bya ba'i ming des ma brten/ ma gnas/ gnas ma bcas par 'du byad

302a1(khri brgyad): ltar lag so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / 'di lta ste tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shA

304b7(khri brgyad): zin na/ 'on ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yong su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur byams pa
304b8(khri brgyad): gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan mi'i dngos po las brjod med pa'i dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni/ 'o na mtshan ma de'ang mi dmigs na 'di ltar brjod med med pa'i dbyings
305a1(khri brgyad): rtogs par 'gyur ram/ byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan mde las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yang ma yin la/ 'di sa ste/ 
305a2(khri brgyad): gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
305a3(khri brgyad): bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
305a4(khri brgyad): 'das la byang chub sede byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du mchis pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa
305a5(khri brgyad): la gnas pa na 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bgyi ba dang / tsher ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du bya de rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes
305a6(khri brgyad): bya ba dang ka sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i bar dag gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mi dmigs na/ bac+doMs ci mchis
305a7(khri brgyad): pa mi dmigs lags sam/ 'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bac+doMs kyis byang chub sede'i byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'du
305a8(khri brgyad): byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ni rang dbang nyid dam/ yod pa nyid gang yang med// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la rnar rtog paden
305b1(khri brgyad): tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtogs pa rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur ram/ gang gi tshe brjod med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel ba'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas
305b2(khri brgyad): ternam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe rnam par mi rtog pas gzung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lag so// byams pa de lta yin na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dang
305b3(khri brgyad): po gang la 'di ltar gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
305b4(khri brgyad): chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du ma zad ngam/ rnam par te ga pa tsam nyid// de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbying
305b5(khri brgyad): la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa rnams dang bral bar gyur ma 'di lta ste gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba
305b6(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de la yod pa gang yin/ gang yod pa ni mi dmigs par 'gyur
305b7(khri brgyad): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bac+doMs la byang chub sede byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sengar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos
305b8(khri brgyad): tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pas rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyod/ tshor ba dang / 'jugs dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rmi shes pa
306a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnam pa du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bac+doMs kyis byang chub
306a2(khri brgyad): byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub se de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas/ gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i brtag
306a3(khri brgyad): po rnam pa gsum du rtogs par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam por shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyo bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnam
306a4(khri brgyad): pa gsum du rtogs par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun tu brta/ gas pa'i gzugs// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzug so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzug so// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni
306a5(khri brgyad): kun tu brtags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa 'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o// 'di lta ste 'di ni kun brtags pa'i 'du sheso// 'di ni rna
306a6(khri brgyad): brtags pa'i 'du she so// 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes// 'di lta ste 'di ni kun brtags pa'i 'du byed rnam so// 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnams// 'di dag ni chos
306a7(khri brgyad): nyid kyi 'du byed rnam so// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 
306a8(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste 'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dgo// 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs kyi chos
306b1(khri brgyad): rnamaso zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sede'abyams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kun brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang
306b2(khri brgyad): lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/ chos nyid kyi gzugs ni gang sngags/ bcom ldan 'das kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
306b3(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni gang lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/ chos
306b4(khri brgyad): nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gang du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang / de la gzu
306b5(khri brgyad): shes bya ba'i ming du dang 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha snya de la brten nas/ gzugs kyi ngo nyid du yong su rtog pa 'di ni kun brtags pa'i gzugaso// byams pa gang
306b6(khri brgyad): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
306b7(khri brgyad): rnams shes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha snyad la brtan nas/ tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sa
306b8(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid yongasu rtog pa 'di ni kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni kun brtag
307a1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar rnam so// 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos por rnam par rtog pa tsam gyi chos la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas
307a2(khri brgyad): mngon par brjod/ gang la 'di ni gzug so zhes bya ba dang tsher ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes rnam so zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams so shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'o/ 
307a3(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamaso zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzug so// 'di ni rnam
307a4(khri brgyad): par brtags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni rnam par ba rtags pa'i 'du she so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa 'i 'du byed rnam so// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam
307a5(khri brgyad): par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go// gang de ba zhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin rga
307a6(khri brgyad): pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang / chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang / gang kun brtags pa'i gzugs des rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs
307a7(khri brgyad): brtamam pa'i dus dang / thar zug ther zug dusu ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang / chos la bdag med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzug so// 
307a8(khri brgyad): ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dgo// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / 
307b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs gzugs gsum po 'di dag las rdza su ma mchis par blta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rdza su ma
307b2(khri brgyad): pa ni gang lags/ rdza su ma mchis pa yang ma lags la/ rdza su mchis pa yang ma lags shing / don dam pa rab tu phye ba ni gang lags/ tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du shes gas
307b3(khri brgyad): po 'di dag dang / 'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdzas su ma mchis pa dag ni gang
307b4(khri brgyad): lags/ rdza su mchis pa ni gang lags/ rdza su mchis pa yang ma lags/ rdza su mchis pa lang ma lags shi nga / don dam pa rab tu phye ba dag ni gang lags/ de skad ces gso
307b5(khri brgyad): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa kun brtags pa'i gzugs de ni rje su med par blta bar bya'o// rnam
307b6(khri brgyad): par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdza su yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yi no// gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdza su med pa
307b7(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ rdza su yod pa yang ma yin zhing / don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o// gang kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
307b8(khri brgyad): pa dang / gang dag kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdza su med par blta bar bya'o// gang rnam par brtags pa'i tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
308a1(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar de dag ni rnam par rtog brda su yod pa'i phyir rdzasu yod par blta bar bya ste/ 
308a2(khri brgyad): rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yi no// byams pa gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / byams pa gang dag chos nyid kyisangs rgyas
308a3(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdza su med pa yang ma len la/ rdza su yod pa lang ma yin zhing / don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
308a4(khri brgyad): 'das sa byang chub sode byams pas 'di skad ces pa sol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs rab tu nga bye ba'i brtags pa yang mchis la de ltar tshor ba dang / 'dra
308a5(khri brgyad): sa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du// rab tu dbye nga'i brtags pa lang mchis na/ 'di lta ste gzugs shes
308a6(khri brgyad): bya ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o// 'di lta ste tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
308a7(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyisu mang ba'i grangasu byas pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de/ bac+doMs kyis cis dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs
308a8(khri brgyad): shes bya ba ni gnyisu med pa'i grasu byas pa'o// ji lta ma tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes byab su/ 'du byed rnapa zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar
308b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba de ni gnyis med pa'i grangs byas pa'o zhes/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub se 'byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sem+ba/ 
308b2(khri brgyad): kun brtags pa'i gzugs la rdza su med pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ 'on te ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// de la gzugs shes bya ba'i ming
308b3(khri brgyad): dang 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha snyad tsam nyid gang yin pa de jig gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags// byams pa rnam grangs 'das gang du
308b4(khri brgyad): brtags pa'i gzugs de gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyi su med pa ste/ 
308b5(khri brgyad): ngas 'di la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o zhes pa ka' stsal par rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam dus
308b6(khri brgyad): gang la brten nas gzugs shes bya ba'i ming dang ba rtags pa dang tha snyadadu 'gyur ba rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rdza su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ji ga gzugs ma yin pa
308b7(khri brgyad): yin ma/ gsol pa/ bac+doMs de ni ma lag so// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun brtags pa'i gzugs des de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin
308b8(khri brgyad): zhing de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par nganagra
309a1(khri brgyad): / pa'i gzugs de yang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma san pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yinas/ gzugs ma yin pa 'ang nga yin padas
309a2(khri brgyad): med pa ste/ ngas de las dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang
309a3(khri brgyad): chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas rab tu phye ba'i gzugs de jig gzugs yin ma/ gsol pa/ bac+doMs de ni ma lag so// chos nyid kyi gzugs de nyid kyi gzugs kyi chos nyid
309a4(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin pa de yi nam/ gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa
309a5(khri brgyad): yang gzugs kyang lin la/ gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin pa de ni gnyi su med pa ste/ ngas de las
309a6(khri brgyad): dgongs nas 'di lta ste gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnar
309a7(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de gad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bac+doMs la byang chub seMd byams pas 'di skad ceso gsal to// bcom
309a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sede shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar gzugs la gnyi su ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing / de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
309b1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spras nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa yongasu 'tshal ba
309b2(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ mngon sum du bgyi ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bur blta bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol
309b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sede byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mtha' gnyis spangs nas 'di
309b4(khri brgyad): ltar dadu ma'i lam du zhugs pas gang gzugs yongasu shes pa yang ma yin yongasu mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongasu shes pa'o// gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
309b5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yongasu shes pa yang ma yin yongasu mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de ni de'i yongasu shes
309b6(khri brgyad): pa'o// gang gzugs spong ba yang ma yin mi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o// gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyu
309b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bar du spong ba yang ma yin mi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o// gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du mi byed la/ mngon sum du mi byed pa yang ma yin pa de nyid
309b8(khri brgyad): mngon sum du byed pa'o// gzugs spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom pa yang ma yin mi sgom pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
310a1(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar bar bya'o//  skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bac+doMs pa byang chub sems dpa' byams tha
310a2(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sengal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di lta bu'i yongasu 'tshal ba dang / spong ba dang / mngon sum du bgyid pa dang / 
310a3(khri brgyad): bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub senga' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub
310a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab go/ ga tu zab bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub se der byams pas 'di skad
310a5(khri brgyad): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i sladadu byang chub sed rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
310a6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin// mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir
310a7(khri brgyad): zab pa dang mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sede'i byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
310a8(khri brgyad): byang chub seMder rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams
310b1(khri brgyad): baM gzhan gyi don la brtsams te/ 'khor ba yongasu mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yino// bdag gis don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa longasu mi gtong ba
310b2(khri brgyad): mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yi no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub seng byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te
310b3(khri brgyad): byang chub seder gzhan gyi don las brtsams taM 'khor ba yongasu mi gtong na/ da 'khor ba yangs ma gtang na/ de 'khor yongasu mi btang bas/ 'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yod
310b4(khri brgyad): su btang bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sede' bdag gi don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu mi gtong na/ 'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongasu bta
310b5(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ba/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'khor bas yang
310b6(khri brgyad): 'khor ba nyidadu rnam par mi rtog/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'di lta ste 'khor ba dang myangan
310b7(khri brgyad): las 'das po de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'khor ba las ying byung bar mi 'gyuraro// 
310b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mya ngan las 'das pa nyi du mi rtog pas mya ngan las 'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du 'khor ba na yang mi nyams/ 
311a1(khri brgyad): da ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de rig pa 'dis 'khor ba yang yong su mi gtongs/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang yongasu mi gtong bar rig par
311a2(khri brgyad): nga skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub songar byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sede'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
311a3(khri brgyad): spyod pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa 'khor ba ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa yang ma mchis shing / mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa lang
311a4(khri brgyad): ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das gal te blangs pa ma mchis pa ji ltar ma btang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di ltar
311a5(khri brgyad): 'khor ba len to zhwa 'am/ mi len to zhes mi smra'o// byam sa pa 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sede'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs
311a6(khri brgyad): pa'i ye shes kyis sems la dbang thob pa thabs la mkha sa bas 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed dag tu
311a7(khri brgyad): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sengar rnams la 'khor ba yongasu mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o// stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu
311a8(khri brgyad): mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sode'i' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan
311b1(khri brgyad): nyid 'dus par ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams
311b2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos
311b3(khri brgyad): ngag dang / stong pa nyid de'i dngos po dang / dngos po med par gang yin pa dang / spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o// de skad ces
311b4(khri brgyad): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sede byam sa pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci/ na thos tha~Mng gcig tu nges par gtan tu mya ngan las 'a
311b5(khri brgyad): pa la gnas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ byams pa de ni ma yi no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byam sa pa 'jig rten ni khams sna tshogs pa khams dums
311b6(khri brgyad): khams du ma'i 'jig rten de na sems can gyi rigs dang rang bzhin mang du dmigs te/ byams pa gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ bzang po'i bye brag nyid
311b7(khri brgyad): thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu lang long / gang zag ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ dman pa nyid thob la de nyid kyis mchog par 'dzin
311b8(khri brgyad): ba'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu yang yod/ gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te dman pa nyid thob la dman par shes nas/ de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin gyi/ de'i
312a1(khri brgyad): / 'og tu bzang po'i bye brag tshol zhing b.rang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bye brag de lta bu'ang yod// dan ces bka' stsal pa dang/ brngos pa byang chub sa
312a2(khri brgyad): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sen rnams kyi rigs rnam pa gsum po gang lags pa de dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
312a3(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chu ba don du gnyer kyang skye ba ma mchis pa ji sgyur thob par 'gyur/ sgrub pa nyid nga skye ba lags par ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma sul lag so// bcom ldan 'as
312a4(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pade'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'gyur ba ra ni nga mi 'dogs kyi/ de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sprul pa dang yongasu bsngos par
312a5(khri brgyad): zhes pa 'dzag so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub seng byams pas 'di skadas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar thog ma nyid
312a6(khri brgyad): nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyem dang bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur pa/ byang chub sad se ma chen po'i ba sam pa rlabs po che dang / che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pan
312a7(khri brgyad): ngamatshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam brlabs pa cheni gang lags/ che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
312a8(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin nyid dang / chas pa nyid dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / labar lo bsgyur ba nyid thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum
312b1(khri brgyad): tshogs pa thang don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ de dag la mi chags shing mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam parlabs po che'o// byang chub sangar rnams 'di
312b2(khri brgyad): lta ste/ 'du byed yongasu mi gtong bas de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du bya bar
312b3(khri brgyad): 'dod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo bar byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ de dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka'
312b4(khri brgyad): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa/ 'byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lnga na 'das byang chub sa de'i chos rnams ni ngo mtshar rmaduH
312b5(khri brgyad): ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rma du byung ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'a ma/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar
312b6(khri brgyad): rma du byung ba rnams la slob par 'tshal bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi lag so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa
312b7(khri brgyad): las/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor bzhi po de dag
312b8(khri brgyad): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston cing / de'i tshe tshig su gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsas to// dga' dang gus dang da
313a1(khri brgyad): mchog ni nyer bzhag te// sgribs nyon mongs dri ma bsal nas rab zhi pas// 'gro don mngon bzhugs des pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin// gang la dpa' rnams spyod
313a2(khri brgyad): pa de ni mnyan par gyis// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chu klung ji snyed 'bab pa dag/ ma dros gnas pa'i klu dang klu bdag rab rten nas// me tog 'bras bu sman dang nags tshal skyeng byed// 
313a3(khri brgyad): de ni klu bdag de yi dpal gyi mthu yin// rgyal ba'i nyan thos bdag ji snyed chos ston dang // 'chad cing rigs pa dag dang ldan par brjod pa dang / bde ba mchog dang byed da
313a4(khri brgyad): 'bras thob pa// de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu// ci phyir zhen rgyal bas chos tshul gang bstan pa// de la mi mchog slob mar gyur pas mngon bslangs
313a5(khri brgyad): shing mngon sum byas nas bslabs pa dza bzhin ston byed// sangs rgyas mthus byed ring gi stobs dang mthum yin// gang la shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mi dmigs
313a6(khri brgyad): byang chub se der mi dmigs byang chub sems mi dmigs// de skad thos nas rmongs pa med cing mi skrag pa// byang chub sade de ni bde gshegs shes rang spyod// gzugs med cho
313a7(khri brgyad): ba med cing 'du shes sems pa med/ de la rnam shes gnas kyi rdul tsam mi rnyed pa/ de ni chos kun mi gnas gnas med rgyu ste/ yongasu bzung med bde gshegs rnams kyi byang
313a8(khri brgyad): chub thob// de nas kun tu rgyu ba bzo sbyangs phyi rol gyi// phung po rnam par 'jig cing shes la dmigs par 'gyur// byang chub sed gang zhig de ltar chos shes shing / mya ngan 'das
313b1(khri brgyad): par mi reg de ni shes rab gnas// gzhan yang shes rab 'di ni gang yin gang gi phyir// gang las 'byung zhes chos 'di thams cad stong par rtog/ nye bar brtags nas zhum pa med cing
313b2(khri brgyad): skrag med pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub nye ba yin/ gal te mi shes bzhin du gzugs dang 'du shes dang // tshor ba sems pa rnam shes phung por spyod byed cing // phung 'di
313b3(khri brgyad): stong zhes longs rtogs byang chub sems dpa' ni// mtshan mar spyod de skye med gnas la reg ma yin// gzugs dang tshor ba dang ni 'du shes sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi spyod
313b4(khri brgyad): gnas med gang rgyu ba// shes rab bstan de spyod ces khas len mi byed// skye med blo lis zhi ba'i ting 'dzin mchog la reg/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rab ni
313b5(khri brgyad): 'dir gnas te// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rna mas kyis lung bstan yin// bdag ni mnyam par ga zhag ces 'am langs shas rlom sems med// ci'i phyir
313b6(khri brgyad): zhe na don chos rang bzhin yongs shes phyir// de ltar spyod na bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod// de ni spyod dang mi spyod rab tu shes pas na// chos gang spyod pa de yang dmigs pa/ 
313b7(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gang zhig yod pa ma yin de ni med ces bya byis pa rnams kyis de btags med dang yod par byed // long dang med pa
313b8(khri brgyad): 'di gnyis med pa'i chos yin te// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di shes dengos 'byung // gang 'dir phung po lnga dag sgyu ma 'dir shes shing // sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan du
314a1(khri brgyad): byed la// sna tshogs 'du shes bral zhing nye bar zhi spyod pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// dge ba'i bshes dang ldan zhing lhag mthong ldan gyur pa/ 
314a2(khri brgyad): rgyal pa rnams kyi yum thos skrag par longs mi 'gyur// gang zhig sdig pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi dring 'dzag pa// de ni snong som btang chus reg zhag pa bzhin// ci phyir 'din
314a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' byan ni// chags pa'i byed pa kun la chags pa gcod 'dod pas// rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med gyur la reg/ des na 'di ni byang chub sems
314a4(khri brgyad): dpa'i ming 'thob pa// ci'i phyir da ni sems dpa' che zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ni sems can phung po chen po'i mchog 'gyur dang / sems can khams kyi lta gyur chen po gcod pa
314a5(khri brgyad): dephyir 'di ni sems dpa' che zhes brjod pa yin// gtong ba tshe dang blo che ba dang mthu che dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi tha ga chen mchog la zhugs pa dang / bdud kyi g.yo
314a6(khri brgyad): rgyu gdul phyir go cha che bgos pa// de'i phyir na sems dpa' che zhes brjod pa yin// dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis pani mdor sprul byas te/ skye bo phal chen mgo mang bye ba gcod par
314a7(khri brgyad): bying / sgyu ma ci 'dra de 'drar sen dkun shes// 'gro kun sprul pa 'dra bar de la 'jigs pa med// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba dang ni sems pa dang // rnam par shes po ma bcings ma
314a8(khri brgyad): grol yod pa min// de ltar byang chub 'jug cing zhum pa'i sems med pa// 'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi go cha mchog/ ci phyir 'di ni bya chub theg chen bya zhe na/ de ni gang bzhin
314b1(khri brgyad): sems can thad mya ngan blo// theg pa 'di ni gzhal med khang chen rnamapa' mtshungs// dga' skying bde ba mngon par thob byed theg pa mchog/ zhon nas gang zhig phyogasu 'gro ba de mi
314b2(khri brgyad): dmigs// mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs na 'gro mi dmigs// dper na me shi de'i 'gro rgyu mi dmigs bzhin// de phyir de ni mya ngan 'das shes brjod pa yin// sngon gyi mtha'
314b3(khri brgyad): dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar yang // byang chub sode'i mi dmigs dus gsum dag pa ste// gang dag de ni 'dus byas ma lin spros med// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchogs
314b4(khri brgyad): yin// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang tshe gang dus na// skye ba med par bsams te de ltar spyod byed cing / snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sen 'du shes med// 'di na
314b5(khri brgyad): shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gal te/ sems can 'du shes sdug bsngal 'du shes skyed/ sdug bsngal spyod par bya zhing 'grod na bya snyam ste/ 
314b6(khri brgyad): bdag dang sen yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod ma yin// bdag ci 'dra ba de 'drar sems can thaMd shes// sems can thang
314b7(khri brgyad): kyi ci 'dra 'drar chos kun shes// skyed pa med dang skye ba gnyi gar mi rtog pa// don shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// 'jig rten dag na chos ming ji skad yongs
314b8(khri brgyad): brjod pa// skye ba kun las yang dag 'das shing thal byas nas// 'chi med ye shes mchog thob de la gzhal med// de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya// byang chub
315a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' gang zhig ngogs med 'di ltar spyod// de ni thabs dang shes rab gnas par shes par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med par yo mu shes gyur pa// 'di
315a2(khri brgyad): ni shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gang zhig gzugs la mi gnas tshor la mi gnas shing // gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems par mi gnas la// rnam shes
315a3(khri brgyad): gangam gnas pa chos nyid mig na sa ste// 'di ni shes rang pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal mi sdug/ bdag dang bdag med de bzhin nyid dang
315a4(khri brgyad): skyong nyid dang // 'bras bu thob dang dgra btsams la mi gnas shing // rang rgyalas dang sangs rgyas sa la mi gnas te// ji ltar ston pa 'das ma byas khams mi gnas
315a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin 'dus byas la yang mi gnas myed rgyu// de ltar byang chub med gnas la gnas med gnas// gnas ma du gnas lan 'di ni rgyal bas gnas shes gsungs// gang
315a6(khri brgyad): dgra ba gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya snyam dang // rang sangs rgyas dang chos rgyal 'gyur bar byed 'dod pa// bzod pa 'di la marten thob par mi nus te// dper na pha rol tshur rol
315a7(khri brgyad): 'gro ngogs mi mthong bzhin// gang zhig chos nyid 'gro dang gang bshad thos pa dang // 'bras bu thob dang rang rgyal de bzhin 'jig rten mgon// mkhas pa gsal ba mya ngan 'das pa gang
315a8(khri brgyad): thob pa// de dag tha da bzhin gshegs pas sras su garigs// gang zag ba ni po de dag de la mi skrag to// rgyal sras bden la mkhas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang // dgra bcom drim
315b1(khri brgyad): bsal cing som nyi spangs pa dang // dge ba'i bshes kyis yongasu smin byas bani pa yin// byang chub sed mkhas pa de ltar spyod pa ni// dgra bcoms la mi slob rkyen rtogs sar mi slob
315b2(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen nyid che du sangs rgyas chos la slob// bslab pa mi slob tshul gyis slob pa de bslab yin// gzugs 'phel ba dang yongs 'bri yongasu bzung phyir min// sna tshogs chos
315b3(khri brgyad): rnams yongasu bzung phyir slob pa min// de ltar slob pa thang mkhyen nyid yongs 'dzin cing // nges 'byung 'di ni sngon dga' ba'i bslab pa yin// gzugs ni shes rab ma yin gzugs
315b4(khri brgyad): ye shes rab med// tsher dang 'du shes sems bdag dang rnam par shes// 'di dag shes rab ma yin de la sa rab med// de dag na mkha'i khams mtshungs tha dad yid ma
315b5(khri brgyad): yin dmigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin de'i pha mtha' med// sems can rang bzhin gang yin de yang pha ma thar med// na mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin de yang pha mtha'
315b6(khri brgyad): medang 'jig rten mkhas pa'i shes rab de yang pha mtha' med// 'du shes chur rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongasu bsgrags// rnam shes rnam par bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro// 
315b7(khri brgyad): gang dag de la 'du shes bral ba rjes thob pa// de dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka' la gnas// gal te pad+ma'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal bzhugs te// ston pa 'di yis sen zhes bya
315b8(khri brgyad): sgra brjod kyang // bzod nas dag pa'i sems can skye ba ga la yod// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod ma tshig yin// gang tshe ni shes rab pha rol phyin 'di dang / mthun pa
316a1(khri brgyad): gyur de tshe sngon gyi skyes mchog gis// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'gyu ro zhes// ngal lung bstan gyur ces rgyal ba de skad gsungs// shes rab pa
316a2(khri brgyad): rol phyin gang mgon po rnams spyod pa// 'di ni gang zhig rtags 'dzin kun tu chub byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang me dang chus mi tshugs// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis glang
316a3(khri brgyad): kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// la las bode gshegs yongasu mya ngan 'das pa yi// mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la// bde gshegs mchod rten gang+gA'i klung gi bya
316a4(khri brgyad): ma snyed// de dag rnams kyis bye ba phrag stong zhing gang ste// yongasu brtag bzung zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thaMd kyis// las
316a5(khri brgyad): gzhan ma byed lha'i me tog spos rab dang // byug pas dus gsum bskal pa 'am de bas lhag ma chod la// gang zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba/ 
316a6(khri brgyad): bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di glegs bam bris byas te// 'chang zhing me tog byug pas bsti bstang byed gyur na// mchod rten byas mchod bsod nams des ni char mi phod// 
316a7(khri brgyad): rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rig sngags che// sems can khams mang mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed// gang dag 'das dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon// 
316a8(khri brgyad): rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med gyur// gang dag phan dang snying brtse ba cas po spyod spyod pa// rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang chub reg/ 'dus
316b1(khri brgyad): byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang yin pa// bde ba de kun 'di las 'byung bar rig par bya// sa bon btab nas sa la gnas nas 'byung 'gyur ba// tshogs pa rnyed nas rnams ma
316b2(khri brgyad): gzugs dag rnam par bskyed// pha rol phyin lnga byang chub yon tan ji snyed pa// de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skye// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal lam gang nas ni rtag 'gro ba// 
316b3(khri brgyad): lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun// gang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro// de nyid nas ni yon tan chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal bas brgya
316b4(khri brgyad): byin dri ba yongasu dris lan gsol pa// gal te ga d+hA'i klung gi bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la/ de kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byu bur bltam gyur kyang // bdag ni
316b5(khri brgyad): shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid len// ci slad tsin sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags// 'on kyang shes rab yongasu bsgoms pas mchod par 'gyur// dper na rgyal
316b6(khri brgyad): bo rten mi rim gro kun thob ltar// sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la rten// nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan ring tang med// gab tshe gang du rtsal ba de ni phyag
316b7(khri brgyad): bgyi 'os// de phyung gyur kyang gab tsa la ni dga' bgyid// yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de'i lags// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis// rgyal ba mya
316b8(khri brgyad): ngan 'das pa'i ring ba srel mchong pas brnyes// de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin 'tshal des// shes rang pha rol phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags// sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon
317a1(khri brgyad): du 'gro ba shes rab ste// tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhi no// dge chos chud mi gsan phyir yongasu 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni chos rnam
317a2(khri brgyad): thad tshul gcig ston par byed// dper na 'jam+bu'i gling na shing mang bye ba stong // rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i gzugs ldan pa// grib mar gyur pa'i grangasu brjod pa ma
317a3(khri brgyad): gtogs par// grib ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag yid ma yin// de bzhin rgyal ba pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang // shes rab pha rol phyin pas yongasu bsngos gyur te// thaMd
317a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid phyir longasu bsngos byas na// bya nga chub bsngos pas drug kun 'dir ni tshul cig gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gal te yongasu mi shes bzhin// gzugs
317a5(khri brgyad): dang 'du shes tshor ba sems dang rnam par shes// mi rtag yongasu brjod pa chos la spyod pa ste// mkhas pa nam yang chos rnams chud gson mi bya// gang la gzugs
317a6(khri brgyad): dang tshor ba 'du shes mi dmigs shing // rnam par shes pa dag dang sems pa mi dmigs la// chos kun skye med stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa
317a7(khri brgyad): spyod mchog yin// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de snyed son la las dgra bcom nyid btul bas// gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te// san gnan
317a8(khri brgyad): la glags byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags// ci phyir zhe na smra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas// chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid 'dir ston byed// de thos nyan thos
317b1(khri brgyad): myur du rnam par grol la reg/ rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg/ lcug ma med par sdong 'byung 'jig rten yong med na// de la lal 'dab me tog 'bras bug
317b2(khri brgyad): la 'byung // byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yod med na// 'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed
317b3(khri brgyad): de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa de bzhin du// mkhas pa'i shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis ni san yon tan chos dang ldan// dper na ma dros mchol
317b4(khri brgyad): bdag med gyur pa ni// chu klung 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir 'bab par ga la 'gyur// chu klung med na me tog 'a bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs ma
317b5(khri brgyad): med par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi// ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga la 'byung // ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med
317b6(khri brgyad): byang chub med// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di ni srin bu me khyer ji snyed pa// kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'od rnams byung ba bas/ 
317b7(khri brgyad): ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig phyung ches mchog ste// me khyer tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char mi phod/ nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang / 
317b8(khri brgyad): sdom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams skyid pa yang // byang chub se da rje su yid rangs sems gcig la// nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos tshar mi pad// 'das dus sngon
318a1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal zad par bya phyi rin chen chong ston to// dang po bya chung mchog tu sems spyad bskyed pa nas rnam par 'dren pa rnams kyi dang chos zad kyi dus// dbar rgyal bde dag bas nas
318a2(khri brgyad): gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang // zhing mang mtha' yas dag na bye stong gang bzhugs dang // gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams// gang
318a3(khri brgyad): yin pa/ pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas gang dag dang // gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang // slob dang mi slob dge ba zag bcas zag med pa// bsdus
318a4(khri brgyad): nas byang chub sengar rje su yid rang byed// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyar phyir thams cad bsngo// yongs bsngo gal te sems dang 'du shes gnas byed cing // byang chub 'du shes
318a5(khri brgyad): longs bsngo sems can 'du shes pa// 'du shes dang ni lta bas sems gsum ldan par gnas// dmigs pa yod pas yong su bsngos par chud ma yin// gal te 'di ltar
318a6(khri brgyad): chos rnams 'gag shing zad pa dang // gang du yongasu bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // chos kyis chos la nam// yang mi bsngo shes gyur na// de ltar rab tu shes pas yongasu
318a7(khri brgyad): bsngos pa yin// gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin// ji ste mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yin// ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba// dkar po'i chu
318a8(khri brgyad): la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs// de ltar bdag gis yongasu bsngo ba bslab bya ste// ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge bar rab mkhyen pa'i// rnam pa gang dang 'byung gang
318a9(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid gang yin la// rje su yid rang de lta de ltar yongasu bsngo// de ltar bsad nams byang chub yongasu sngo byed na// dug meng sangs rgyas me spong rgyal bas gsungs pasmra/ 
318b1(khri brgyad): de ltar yongs sngo dpa' bo 'jig rten dmigs can gyi// byang chub sa dang thaMd de yis zil gyis gnon// dmus long dmigs bub med pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams// lam yang mi shes
318b2(khri brgyad): grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur// shes rab med na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di// dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin// gang tshe shes rab kyi ni rab tu
318b3(khri brgyad): zin gyur na// de dag mig rnyeng gyur cing 'di dag ming thob bo// dper na ri mo'i las ni yangs zin mig med pa// mig ma byas pas dri che rngan pa mi thob bzhin/ gang tshe 'dus byas sa
318b4(khri brgyad): ma byas dang dkar nags chos// shes rab rnam par zhig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe// 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro// na mkhar gar mi gnas bkyi
318b5(khri brgyad): yang med pa bzhi ni// gal te bdag ni rgyal ba'i shes rab spyad bya zhing // sa ni sdug bsngal rig pa khrag khrig mang sgrol sems// seMn 'du shes yongs brtag byang chub
318b6(khri brgyad): so ngang ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog min// byang chub se dar gang zhig sngon spyad spyod pa'i tshe// pha rol phyin 'dir spyad pa mkhas pa som nyid mo// thos ma
318b7(khri brgyad): thag tu de na ston pa'i 'du shes bskyod// de'i byang chub zhi pa myur du rtogs par 'gyur// sngon spyod tsho na sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang // rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin
318b8(khri brgyad): la ma dang na// de ni dper na tshong pa rin chen glong sang la// zong rnams zad par byas nas phyir ldog byed dang mtshungs// de lta bas na gol te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog/ reg par
319a1(khri brgyad): 'dod na rgyal ba'i yul 'dir dang par gyis// thos nas blo chung gang zhig 'di ni spong byung ba// de spangs nas ni mnar med 'gro ste skyabs med 'gyur// gzugs
319a2(khri brgyad): kyi dag pa 'bras bu'i dag par rig par bya// 'bras bu gzugs dag thad mkhyen nyid dag par gsungs// thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag pas gzugs kyang dag/ nam
319a3(khri brgyad): khams dang mtshungs shing gcad med dam pa med// dpa' bo shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'dir spyod pa// byang chub seda' khams gsum yang dag 'das gyur cing // nyon mongs
319a4(khri brgyad): bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston par byed// rga dang na dang 'chi ba med kyang 'chi 'pho ston// 'gro ba 'di dag 'dod mi gzugs kyi 'angam la thogs// til gyi 'khor
319a5(khri brgyad): lo lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyam// 'gro ba 'khrul pa ri dgas rgya 'dra shes gyur na// shes rab ldan pa mkha' la bya bzhin rnam par rgyu// spyod pa yongs
319a6(khri brgyad): dag gang zhig gzugs la mi spyod cing // rnam shes 'du shes tshor ba sems par mi spyod na// de ltar spyod pa chags pa thang yongs spodang // chags las rnam par grol ba ba
319a7(khri brgyad): gshegs shes rab spyod// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sedar mkhas gsal ba// chags pa bcad nas 'jig rten chags pa med par 'gyur// nyi ma sgra gcan bza'
319a8(khri brgyad): bral lha ngar 'dug pa dang // ma btang rtswa dang shing dang nags tshal bsreg pa bzhin// chos rnams tha~Md rang bzhin dag par longs rtogs shing // byang chub sems dpa' shes
319b1(khri brgyad): rab pha rol phyin mthong na// byed pa po yang mi dmigs chos kun mi dmigs te// 'dir ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// rgyal ba la ni lha rgyal brgya byin gyis
319b2(khri brgyad): zhus pa// byang chub seMde'i shes rab spyod pa ji ltar brtson// phung po khams la rdul tsam brtson par mi byed pa// phung por mi brtson de ni byang chub se de'i brtson// gang zhig chos
319b3(khri brgyad): 'di sprul dang sgyu ma 'drar thos na// so mo nyid med cing bslab la phyir zhing sbyor byed pa// san de ni ring nas thig zhugs rig par bya// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mngal lhag byas
319b4(khri brgyad): yin/ dpag tshad mang por dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i mis// gnag rdzi mtshoms dang nags tshal phu na sum tshogs mthong na// 'di dag grong khyer nye ba'i rtags skam
319b5(khri brgyad): dbugs phyin rnyed par gyur cing chom rku na 'jigs pa med// de bzhin byang chub yongasu tshol che rgyal rnams// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di mnyan pa gang
319b6(khri brgyad): thob pa// de ni dbugs phyin thob par gyur cing / 'jigs med// dgra bcoms la ma yin rkyen rtogs la min// mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba yis// gal
319b7(khri brgyad): shing dang nags rnams mthong nang dung ring // ji ste ma mthong rgya mtsho ma ring ste// nye bar gyur pa'i rtags yin snyam du som nya med// de ltar byang chub dam par rab zhun
319b8(khri brgyad): rig bya ste// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyan pa// rnam par 'dren pas mngon sum lung stan ma gyur kyang // ring po mi thogs sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur
320a1(khri brgyad): dbyi dus bzang 'byung rtswa dang lo ma yal kha rnams// lo ma 'bras bu me tog yang dag skyed par byed// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di su'i lag thob pa// ring por mi
320a2(khri brgyad): thogs 'dren pa'i byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bud med sbrum pa'i sdug bsngal nyen gyur na// de ni de'i btsa' ba'i dus bab shes par bya// de bzhin byang chub se
320a3(khri brgyad): rgyal ba'i shes rab nyan// 'dun pa rtog cing myur du byang chub rag par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin spyod che rnal 'byor pa// gzugs kyi 'phel ba dang ni yongasu 'grib mi
320a4(khri brgyad): mthong // chos dbyings chos dang chos min rnam su mi mthong ste// mya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni shes rab gnas// gang zhig 'dir spyod sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rtog ste/ 
320a5(khri brgyad): stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang byang chub zhi mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog rtog bral byin gyi rlabs kyis spyod// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// smra
320a6(khri brgyad): ba'i zla ba sangs rgyas la ni rab 'byor zhus// ston pas rab tu gcod par 'gyur ba mang gsungs na// yo na tan dga' ba rnams kyi bar dug cod gang lags// de la chung zad
320a7(khri brgyad): tsam zhig yongasu rjod par bya// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig zas tshe// spobs pa tha dad rnam pa du ma 'byung 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i don ma byas par glog bzhin
320a8(khri brgyad): myur du yang // yongasu nyams par 'gyur ba 'di ni bdud kyi las// 'di bshad tshe na kha cig som nyi za 'gyur te// 'dren pas 'dir ni bdag gi ming yang longs ma brjod// 
320b1(khri brgyad): rigs dang sa dang rus kyang longasu ma brjod ces// de ni nyan par mi 'gyur spong 'gyur bdud kyi las// de ltar rtsa ba thab ni yongasu mi shes pas// blun po de dag lal kha 'dab ma
320b2(khri brgyad): tshol bar 'gyur// glang po rnyed kyang glang po'i rdzas ni tshol ba ltar// shes rab pha rol phyin thos mdo tshol de bzhi no// dper na la la ro brgya ldan pa'i zas rnyed la// zas mchog
320b3(khri brgyad): rnyed nas drug cu pa dag tshol byed ltar// byang chub sa de pha rol phyin pa 'di rnyed nas// dgra bcom sa las byang chub tshol byed de bzhi no// bsti stang 'dod par 'gyur zhing
320b4(khri brgyad): rnyed pa 'dod 'gyur dang // lta ba'i sems dang bcas te khyim 'dris byed ldan zhing // chos btang nas ni chos min bya ba spyod 'gyur ba// lam po ral mgol song ba
320b5(khri brgyad): 'di ni bdud kyi las// gang dag de'i tshe na chos kyi dam pa 'di// nyan par 'dun cing dad pa bskye da bar gyur pa las// de dag chos smra bya ba min dang ldan rig rma
320b6(khri brgyad): dga' ba med par gyur cing yid kyang mi bde ba sa// dri'i tshe na bdud kyi las 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang bar chad 'gyur ba rnam pa du mA ste// de tshe gang dag
320b7(khri brgyad): gis ni dge slong mang dkrugs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di ni 'dzin mi byed// rin chen gang dag rin tang med cing dkon gyur pa// de dag la ni rtag tu dgra yang
320b8(khri brgyad): rab tu mang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ dkon mchog rin chen la yang gnod pa byed pa'ang mang // thag pa gsar du zhugs pasan blo chung
321a1(khri brgyad): ba gang zhig dkon pa'i rin chen 'di ni ma rnyed pa// de la bar chad bya phyir bdud ni spro bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'di dag yongasu 'dzin dang
321a2(khri brgyad): ldan nam zhig na bar gyur la bu ni mang yod pa// de kun yid mi bde zhing de la rim 'gro byed// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas kyang // yum
321a3(khri brgyad): 'argyur shes rab dam pa 'di la dgongs pa mdzad// gang dag 'das dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon gang dang // ma 'ongs dus na 'byung 'gyur de dag 'di las byung // 
321a4(khri brgyad): 'jig rten ston pa bskyed pa rgyal ba rnams kyi lum// son gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed// 'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// rang rgyal
321a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid// gci ga pa nyid de dngos bral gzhan min de bzhin nyi de// shes rab pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen// 
321a6(khri brgyad): mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung // chos nyid skyon med chos rnam stong pa 'dig nas te// byang chub seng de bzhin nyid 'di rjesu rtogs// de phyir
321a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyams dgar rab rten pa// stobs bcu rnams 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te// seMn
321a8(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las longs 'don kyang // de dag nam kyang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med // dper na seng+ge ri sul brten nas 'jigs med par// ridwags
321b1(khri brgyad): phra mo skrag par byed cing sgra sgrog ltar// mi'i seng+ge shes rab pha rol phyin rten nas// mu stegs can mang skrag byed 'jigs med sgra yang sgrog/ dper na na mkhar gnas pa'i
321b2(khri brgyad): ma'i 'od zer ni// sa 'di skems par byed cing gzugs kyang rab tu ston// de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rol phyin brten pa// sred pa'i chu klung skems shing chos kyang rab
321b3(khri brgyad): tu ston// gzugs rnams mi mthong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing // 'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa mi mthong zhing // gang la rnam par shes pa dang sems kyang mi mthong ba
321b4(khri brgyad): 'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// na mkha' mthong zhes san tshig du rab ba rjod pa// na mkha' ji ltar mthong ba don 'di rtogs shig ltar
321b5(khri brgyad): de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// mthong ba dper ni brjod par nus pa ma yi no// gang gis de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun mthong // 
321b6(khri brgyad): rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed ltar// sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa// de dag tha~Md shes rab pha rol phyin pa byed// rgyal po grang
321b7(khri brgyad): du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi 'gro la// rang gi yul las 'du ba thad sdud pa ltar// byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid gang du'ang mi g.yo' la// sangs rgyas so'i yon tan gang yin
321b8(khri brgyad): thams cad sdud// gang zhig bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa'i brtan zhing // shes rab pha rol phyin mchog la bsam sbyor ba// nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis shinatu
322a1(khri brgyad): 'das byas nas// zil gyis mi non rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du thob// dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru ni chag gyur la// mi gang ro'am rtswa 'am shing
322a2(khri brgyad): ni mi 'dzin pa// chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te ngog su phyin mi 'gyur// gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de ltar gang dag dang ldan dang pa rnyed gyur
322a3(khri brgyad): pa shes rab pha rol phyin pa rnam par spong mi byed// de dag thabs kyi yon tan shes rab yongs bzung ste// mchog tu rmad byung ba de gshegs byang chub myur tu reg/ dper
322a4(khri brgyad): nal las rdza so ma btang chu skyed na// nyam sa chung phyir ni myur du 'jig par rig par bya// so btang bum par chu skyed lam tu 'jig pa yis// 'jigs pa med
322a5(khri brgyad): pa'i bde bar khyim du phyin par ra gyur// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang // shes rab rnam par nyams na myur du 'jig par 'gyur// dang
322a6(khri brgyad): pas shes rab de ni yongasu zin gyur na// sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang // nor dang bcas
322a7(khri brgyad): shing tshong bar bcas te 'jigs par 'gyur// gru de legs pa rabacos logs byas dang ldan gyur na// mi 'jig nor dang bcas pa ngog su phyin par 'gyur// de ltar byang chub
322a8(khri brgyad): se dar dad pas yongs bsgoms kyang // shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur// de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na// ma smas ma nyams rgyal
322b1(khri brgyad): ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur// lo brgya nyi shu lon te rgas shing sdug bsngal mi// langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te// de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mi
322b2(khri brgyad): ris rten byas na// 'gyel ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub seng shes rab stobs chung ba// rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang bar
322b3(khri brgyad): du 'jig par 'gyur// de nyid thabs dang shes rab mchog gis longs zin na// mi 'jigs de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dang
322b4(khri brgyad): po'i las kyi sar gnas gang // lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ slob ma bzang po bla ma gus dang rab ldan pa// mkhas de dag gis
322b5(khri brgyad): dge ba shes rtag tu bstan par bya// ci phyir zhen mkhas pa'i yon tan de las 'byung // deng gshes rab pha rol phyin pa rje su ston// sangs rgyas chos rnams dge
322b6(khri brgyad): ba'i bshes la bston to zhes/ yon tan ku na gyi mchog mngar rgyal ba de skad gsungs// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan
322b7(khri brgyad): shes rab byang chub yongasu bsngo bar gyis// phung po zhan nas mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed ces// dang po'i las can dag la de skad bstan par bya// de ltar spyod pa legs
322b8(khri brgyad): mtsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang bung ba nyan dang ni gnas yin te// rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dod dang // gsal byed sgron ma chos mchog smra
323a1(khri brgyad): ba mi 'khrugs bzhin// grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha gon byed// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min// theg gsum 'du shes
323a2(khri brgyad): bral zhing longasu bzung ba med// mi ldog g.yo ba med cing chos rnams 'khrugs pa med// de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med// som nyid yid gnyis 'gyod dang
323a3(khri brgyad): bral zhing don dang ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nu ra ba// gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog par bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'
323a4(khri brgyad): lus kyang rtogs pa med cing thob par gyur med pa// don gcig nyid du rtogs nas phan byed snying brtser 'gyur// blo chung sa na tshogs sus 'di ni shes par 'gyur// sen
323a5(khri brgyad): rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'di da// 'dzin la gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmo sa mun pa bzhin// thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin mad
323a6(khri brgyad): 'di ni 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin// na mkha'i khams ni shar gyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang // de bzhin dub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pa mtha' yas// steng dang
323a7(khri brgyad): 'og dang phyogs bcu ji snyed rnams na'ang // tha dad gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur pa med// 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ma phyin de bzhin nyid// da ltar de bzhin nyid dang dgra ba
323a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid// chos kun de bzhin nyid dang rgyal ba'i de bzhin de nyid// de ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid bye brag med// bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur
323b1(khri brgyad): ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa// thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor// 'dren pa shes rab med na 'thob par 'gyur ma yin// bya zhig
323b2(khri brgyad): lus tshe dpag tshad brgya pa yod gyur tam// dpag tshad lnga bcur gyur pa'i gshog zad stobs med pa// de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir// bdag
323b3(khri brgyad): nyid mchongs na de ni nyam nyes 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing // smon lam mtha'
323b4(khri brgyad): las rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bsnyen kyang // thabs med shes rab bral ba nyan thos nyi ltung // sa ngas rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'a byung 'dod pas// 'gro ba
323b5(khri brgyad): kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang // phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid dang brtul ba dang // thab med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya// 'jig
323b6(khri brgyad): rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor longs zhus pa// yon tan rgya mtsho nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol// mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba/ 
323b7(khri brgyad): de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bsten gsol// tha dad 'du shes bral zhing tshig dang ldan par smra// dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la brten mi byed// 
323b8(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dus gsum rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs// de dag dge ba bcu'i las lam mngon par brtson// zang zing med par 'gro la chos ni rje su ston// chos la
324a1(khri brgyad): cig du dga' zhing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan// 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gnya' shing gang tsam lta zhing 'gro la
324a2(khri brgyad): sems 'khrul med// gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gros 'chang gsum po dbyen zhing dag/ khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod nad pa 'dod ma yin// bdud kyi yul las 'das
324a3(khri brgyad): shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ bsam gtan bzhi la bsam med bsam gtan der mi gnas// grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas sems dkris med// khyim par gyur
324a4(khri brgyad): na rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags// 'tsho ba 'i longs spyod mi mthun 'tsho ba'i bsam pa med// drag shul spyod sngags bud med sbyor ba'i sngags mi byed// 
324a5(khri brgyad): rtsa 'am 'dod phyir ma las las rnams le na mi byed rab tu dben pa shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// 'thab dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i sems kyang
324a6(khri brgyad): brtan kun mkhyen 'dod cing brtan la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan// mtha' 'khor kla klo skye bo yul mthab rnam par spangs// rang gis la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra// chu
324a7(khri brgyad): phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor rab tu brtson// mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya// gzugs tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam shes rnams// zab cing rang bzhin
324a8(khri brgyad): mtshan ma med de rab zhi ba// shes rab kyis ni phung po rtags pas gting mi rtogs// dper na mnga' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug tshol dang mtshungs// byang chub sems dpa' gang
324b1(khri brgyad): zhig zang mos 'di lta bur// don dam gos pa med pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa ste// gang na phung po med cing khams dang skye mched med// de la bsod nams sogs par ji ga ga la byed
324b2(khri brgyad): dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes pa zhig/ bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad rnam rtog pa// de ni nyin gcig sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par byang chub
324b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' rjes rtogs// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bskal mang bye stong du// sbyin pa sbyin dang tshul khrims dri med srung byed kyang // gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin
324b4(khri brgyad): mchog ldan pa'i mchog/ rjod pa'i legs la sbyin dang khrims kyis tshor mi phos// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te// de las
324b5(khri brgyad): langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing // de yang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur sngon// dge bde dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med// bsod nams de yang
324b6(khri brgyad): gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang // gsob dang ya ma R+Ya dang snying po med par snang // de ltar spyad pa spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod// de ltar spyod pa bsod nams dpag med
324b7(khri brgyad): yongasu 'dzin// sangs rgyas rab tu bshad pa mdzad cing gzung mdzad cing // chos de tha mas cad brjod pa tsam du zad par shes// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod
324b8(khri brgyad): byas kyang // chos kyi dbyings la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// gang zhig rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di dang // ming tsam zad par yongasu brjod pa'i chos de dag/ lo
325a1(khri brgyad): sngo rlom sems med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// nyams pa med cing sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur// 'bru bar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po lnga
325a2(khri brgyad): snying po tshig min de med pas kyang tshig pa min// mi lce phrad ba thams snying po cheg min la// me s+t+rai tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog rag
325a3(khri brgyad): ma yin la// de med pas kyang de la reg par nus ma yin// tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub bzhi 'tho'i nus ma yin// de ming bas kyang de 'thong nus pa ma yino// sa bon las ni myu gum
325a4(khri brgyad): tog 'bras bu 'byung // de yang 'gags la de med par yang shing de med// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te// de yang 'gags la de med par yang byang chub
325a5(khri brgyad): med chu'i thigs pa dang po chung ngu chung ngu yang // ri mas kyis tha mas rje ma yongasu gang bar byed/ de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste// rim rgyu
325a6(khri brgyad): dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa chos spyod cing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan ma la spyod pa// dpe ri na mnyan pa
325a7(khri brgyad): mkhas pa par 'gro chur 'gro yang // mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhi no// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag/ stobs bcus
325a8(khri brgyad): byang chub lung bstan snyam mi sems// 'di la ci yang med ces byang chub skrag pa med// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// dgon pa'i lam na lo nyes
325b1(khri brgyad): nad bcas 'jig rten rnams// mthong na skrag pa med cing bsgral ba'i go gyon te// phyi ma'i mu mthar rtag tu brtson zhing rab shes nas// longasu skyo ba'i yid kyi rdul tsam
325b2(khri brgyad): skyed pa med// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab spyod byed cing // phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes// mnyam par ma bzhag sems can khams
325b3(khri brgyad): lo snying rje 'jug/ bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las long mi nyams// dper na skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan zhing // stobs ldan mi thung rgya rtsal brtson byas
325b4(khri brgyad): tshul shes la// 'phong dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing // sgyu ma bsgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig/ pa dang ma dang chung mar bcas pa yongs
325b5(khri brgyad): bsdus na// dgra byed mang po dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang // de'i sa dpa'o zhing rdul 'od skyes bu mang sprul nas// bde bar song zhing phyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar
325b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin de tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang // sems can khams rnams kun la snying rje chen po bskyed// bdud bzhi dag dngas gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas// 
325b7(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin 'di la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed// mkha' la rlung rten de la chu'i phung po rten// de las chen 'di rten de la 'gro ba rtan// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyun
325b8(khri brgyad): de 'dra ste// don ra de mkha' la gnas pa yin par bsam par bya// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gnas pa// bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'gro la rab ston cing
326a1(khri brgyad): sems rnams kyi shes dang smon lam thabs stobs te// mya ngan 'das la mi reg stong par gnas pa med/ gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal
326a2(khri brgyad): bang stong pa zhi pa'i ting 'dzin dam pa 'di spyod pa// bar skabs dar ni mtshan ma sgom par mi bya ste// mtshan ma med par gnas shing zhi la rab zhi spyod// bar snang 'phur ba'i byal
326a3(khri brgyad): gnas yod ma yin te// de na gnas pa ma yin sa la ltung mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgo spyod pa// mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan mi spod ma yin// 
326a4(khri brgyad): dper na 'phongs bslabs skyes bus gyen du mda' 'phas te// mda' gzhan dag gis gcig nas gcig tu long btags nas// snga ma'i mnga' ngas la ltung ba'i skab
326a5(khri brgyad): mi byed// mi de 'dod na mdo des la ltung bar gyur// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mtsha ga spyod pa// shes rab thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam
326a6(khri brgyad): rgyu zhing yadi dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de srid stong nyid dam pa de ni thob mi byed // dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig/ mkhar gnas
326a7(khri brgyad): te cho 'phrul zung dag rnam par 'phrul// 'gre dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal dang 'dug pa ston// do ni 'jog pa med cing de la skye bo me'i// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa
326a8(khri brgyad): stong gnas shing // mi shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol sa na la gnas med mya/ 'gro ba dag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' las ston// bskal pa bye bar nyams pa med cing spro ba med// dpa
326b1(khri brgyad): na mi 'ga' g.yangs chen por 'dug byed cing // lag pa gnyis gas gdugs gnyis 'dzin cing ji mi snyam// dus min rlung gis g.yangs chen por phul byas kyang // 
326b2(khri brgyad): bdag nyid der ni g.yang du ltung bar 'gyur ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdugs ni longs bzung
326b3(khri brgyad): ste chos rnams stong pa mtshan med smin pa med rtog cing // mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la chos kyang mthong // dper na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen gling song ste// rin chen
326b4(khri brgyad): rnyed nas phyir yang khyim du 'ong bar byed// de dang pon de ni de la bde ba 'tsho yod kyi// 'on kyang gnyen bshes tshogs kyi sdug bsngal yid la 'byung // de ltar sto
326b5(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi rin chen glang song ste// snying rje chen tha bskyed cing sems can 'du shes med // de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur// rtag tu yul la
326b6(khri brgyad): bsod nams don yod yongasu spyod// lha mi sen ring nas ngan song gsum 'brel pa// yongasu dgrol bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// shes rab pha rol phyin pa
326b7(khri brgyad): nying mtshan brtson byed pa// lom yangs 'di ni sems can khams kyi 'bab stegs ston// mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa'i rin chen mchog/ dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par
326b8(khri brgyad): gyur te dga' ba las// rnyed ma thag tu stor te bag med gyur pas na// stor bas sdug bsngal rtag tu rin chen mngon 'dod pa// de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin
327a1(khri brgyad): chen mtshungs pa'i// shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya// rin chen rmed nas 'dzin par byed cing mi byed na// rje su 'brel par byed cing chu
327a2(khri brgyad): du dbang du 'gyur// 'od zer 'brang bas mun pas dkrugs pa'i mun nag kun// sel bar byed cing sprin med mkha' la nyi shar na// srog chags 'byung po srid du
327a3(khri brgyad): khyer thang dang // skar ma'i cho gas dang zla ba'i 'od kun zil gyis non// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa lta thibs
327a4(khri brgyad): sel byed cing // 'gro ba kun dang dgra bcom rang rgyal zil gyis non// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa mtshan med yongs spyad phyir// dper na rgyal po'i bya
327a5(khri brgyad): zhig nor gtong don 'dod pa// kun gyi gtsobar gyur te mngon par 'gro bya'os// 'di ni lta na yang seMn dga' byed no// thabs thob gyur nas rgyal srid
327a6(khri brgyad): gnas na smos ci dgos// de ltar spyad spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // bdud rtsi sbyin pa byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'// 'di ni da lta na yang sen mang
327a7(khri brgyad): pan brtson// chos kyi rgyal por gnas par gyur nas smras ci dgos// de'i tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur// mya ngan sdug bsngal nyams thag mthu chung yid mi
327a8(khri brgyad): bden ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid nur gyur zhes// 'jigs pa ston phyir phyogs rnams bsreg cing skar mda' gting // gang ga tshe mkhas pa de dag
327b1(khri brgyad): bsam pa rab ldan zhing // nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog don lha// rtag tu lus dang sems ni mkha 'gro bya ltar gyur// de la nag po'i rtsa lag glags rnyed ga pa
327b2(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ gang che byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing // phan tshun mi thun khros pa'i sems dang ldan 'gyur pa// de'i tshe na bdud ni dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// 
327b3(khri brgyad): de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring du 'gyur// de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar 'gyur// de gnyis rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur// sdang
327b4(khri brgyad): zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod// de ni bdud rnams dga' zhing bdud la thub mi 'a gyur// lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig/ 
327b5(khri brgyad): lung bstan thob la sems khras rtsod pa rtsom bya dan// tha ba skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par phyir lang go cha bgo dgo so// sangs rgyas
327b6(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg/ de snyam sems shing mo legs snyam pa'i blo skyed de// so sor 'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sdom gtogs par// de ni dgra
327b7(khri brgyad): bcom rang rgyal dag la 'dod med pa// 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i sras kyi dben par gsungs// gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya lod pa'i ri'i sul// sbrul gyis gang bar
327b8(khri brgyad): lo mang bye bar gnas byed kyang // dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// lhag pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin// byang chub seMder 'gro ba'i don
328a1(khri brgyad): brtson bsam gtan dang // stobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting 'dzin slob rnams la// 'di ni dgon dben spyod pa min snyam sems byed pa// de ni dgon pa'i spyod
328a2(khri brgyad): yul min zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dgon par gnas kyang rung // theg pa gnyis kyi sems bral byang chub mchog ngas na// 'di ni 'gro don zhug
328a3(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyi dben pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' de ni bdag nyams gzhan ma yin// de lta bas na mkhas bsang rgyal bco mo byas te// bsam pa drag pos byang chub dam
328a4(khri brgyad): pa tshol ba na// nad pa shin tu gso phyir sman pa bsten pa ltar// g.yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes bsten par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs byung
328a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpar dag pha rol phyin dang mchung sa pa'i dge ba'i bshesu bsten// de dag nan tan saM 'di rje su ston pa yin// rnam pa gnyis kyis sangs rgyas
328a6(khri brgyad): byang chub rjes rtogs// rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcur gang bzhugs pa// kun sum pa ros phyin pa 'di yi na gzhan mA yin// pha rol phyin 'di byang
328a7(khri brgyad): chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi// gsal dang sgron dang nang dang ston pa yin zhes bstan// ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtshan gyis stong // de ltar mtshan dang chu
328a8(khri brgyad): 'di thaMd sus shes shing // chos rnams stong zhing mtshan nyid med par rab shes na// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// sen zas dang 'dod pa
328b1(khri brgyad): yongasu rtog byed cing // 'khor ba chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yod min stong pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis
328b2(khri brgyad): bdag la na mkha'i mdud 'di bcings// dper na drogs pas 'du shes kyis ni dug blangs pa// dug de lto bar song ba ma yin kyang 'gyel// de ltar byis pa bdag dang
328b3(khri brgyad): bdag gis khas blangs pa// 'du shes skyes pas 'chi yang rtag tu yod ma yin// ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang bdag gi mi dmigs
328b4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag par gsungs// 'di la nyon mongs rnam dag gang yang yod min par// byang chub sems dpas shes rab pha rol phyin pas rtogs// 'dzam
328b5(khri brgyad): gling ma lus dag na sems can ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas la// kun kyang
328b6(khri brgyad): 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur sngo yang // gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa// tha na nyi ma gcig cag rje su 'thun byed na// bsod nams de la
328b7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i phung pos cha rim po de// de phyir g.yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// byang chub sems dpa
328b8(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dbang po stobs thob pa// mya ngan 'das la reg par mngon par dga' mod kyi// 'on kyang sdug bsngal sems can sdug bsngal yid la 'byung // tshong ba gang
329a1(khri brgyad): / zhig grong khyer nang nas grong brdal dang // grong du bya ba'i phyir dang shes rab bya phyir 'gro// der yang mi gnas rin chen gling du rang mi gnas la// mkhas
329a2(khri brgyad): khyim du mi gnas lam la mkhas par 'gyur// de bzhin rang rgyal bcas pa'i nyan thos rnam grol shes// kun la byang chub sems dpa' gsal ba mkhas par 'gyur/ 
329a3(khri brgyad): de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin// lam mkhas cho ga shes pa 'dus byas gnas mi 'gyur// gang tshe 'gro la byams pa rje su 'brel byas nas// stong pa
329a4(khri brgyad): mtshan med smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin spyod// gal te mya ngan 'das la rab byed de la med// de lta mod kyi de ni thob par byed kyang nus// dper na sprul pa'i ma lus mi
329a5(khri brgyad): snang ma yin zhing // de ni ming gis gdags parabya bar nus pa ste// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa// de ni ming gis gdags nus rnam
329a6(khri brgyad): pa gzhan du min// gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs dris la// byang chub sems dpa' zab chos yongasu mi ston te// stong pa mtshan ma med dang mi ldog chos rnams kun
