329a7(khri brgyad): mi 'chad de ni lung bstan ma yin rig par bya// dgra bcom sa dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas ye shes dang // khams gsum dag la rmi lam na yang mi 'dod cing // 'gro la chos
329a8(khri brgyad): ston mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// rmi lam na ni sen ngan song gsum gnas mthong // skad cig de la ngan song rgyun
329b1(khri brgyad): gcang smon lam btab// bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis me'i phung po ni// de ni mi ldog lung stan yin par rig par bya// mi'i 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon dang nad mang ba/ 
329b2(khri brgyad): phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis zhing // 'on kyang rlom sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// byang chub seng
329b3(khri brgyad): bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems sam// bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis rnam pa grub med dam// pha rol lung bsten len snam rlom sems 'byung gyur na// rlom sem
329b4(khri brgyad): gnas pa de ni blo chung rig par bya// ming gi ga zhi las bdud ni nye bar 'ongs gyur nas/ 'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang // khyod kyi bdun mes rgyud kyi
329b5(khri brgyad): bar gyi ming len zhing // 'di ni khyod kyi sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming yin zhes 'am// sbyangs sdoms ci 'dra' brtson pa rnal 'byor ldan de la// khyod sngon yon
329b6(khri brgyad): tan tshul yang 'di zhes brjod byed de// de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongasu bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rab tu dben pa'i
329b7(khri brgyad): grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa nags khrod rab tu ston byed cing // bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongasu
329b8(khri brgyad): bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rtag tu grong dang yul 'khor grong rdal gnas byed cing // byang chub ldan pa sems cani smon byed ma byed la// bral bar gyur pa de ni sangs
330a1(khri brgyad): rgyas chos 'dir slob// gang zhig slob la bslang ba gang du sleb med cing // slob pa po dang bslab pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs la// bslab dang bslab pa ma
330a2(khri brgyad): yin 'di gnyis mi rtog pa// de ltar gang slob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bslab 'dir de ltar shes// de ni bslab nyams tshul khrims
330a3(khri brgyad): 'chal pa gzhan mi 'gyur// de ni mnyes par byed cing sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// bslab pa mkhas shing dmigs pa med par gyur pas slob// mkhas pa 'od ces rnams
330a4(khri brgyad): kyi shes rab de ltar spyod// dge ba ma yin sems cig tsam yang skyed mi byed// nyi ma bar snang la ni 'gro bar byed pa na// 'od zer snang bas mdun na mun pa mi gnas bzhin
330a5(khri brgyad): shes rab pha rol pa bslabs par byas rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa tha~Mng 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyu ra// 'jigs tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar
330a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par 'gyur// dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags nas dbang po gzhan// gang dag ji snyed yod pa zad par 'grag par 'gyur// 
330a7(khri brgyad): de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thad 'dir ni 'dus par gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag nyan thos ston dang // nga rgyal yon
330a8(khri brgyad): kun la bslabs par gyur pa rnams de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi bskyed// 'di ni bdag gi bslang bya yod snyam de phyir slob// mi ldog byang chub mchog la rab tu zhus
330b1(khri brgyad): pa yi/ sems bskyed pa la bsam pa zag pas yid rang bas// stong gsum ri rab srang la gzhal nas tshang gzung rung // rje su yi rang dge ba de ni de ltar min// dge bdon gnyis
330b2(khri brgyad): thar 'dod sems can ji snyed da kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yid rang gyur// de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan thob gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chu
330b3(khri brgyad): sprin byed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mi rtog chos rnams kun// snying dang mtshan ma med par spros med yongs shes la// shes rab bsam pa thag pas byang chub mi tshol
330b4(khri brgyad): bi rnal 'byor pa de shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// nam pa'i khan khams gnyis tha dad 'gyur du ni// de dang de la gang phyir ces kyang bye brag med// de bzhin shes
330b5(khri brgyad): rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // na mkha' mtshungs shing dran pa nye bar zhi bar spyod// skye ba'i dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'ang snyam du// skye bo 'di dag mgu
330b6(khri brgyad): bya mi sems bya ba med// g.yo sgyu sna tshogs rab tu ston pa de yang mthong // 'on kyang de la lus med sems med ming yang med// de bzhin shes rab spyod pa rnams kyang 'angs
330b7(khri brgyad): dus byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro ba yongasu sgrol mi sems// rang gi skye ba bya ba sna tshogs ldan pa'ang ston// sgyu ma lta bur rnam par rtog pa med par spyod// dper na sangs rgyas
330b8(khri brgyad): sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed// da ni ci zhig bya snyam nga yang sems mi bskyed// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub senga' yang // sprul pa sgyu ma bzhin du bya ba thaMd ston// 
331a1(khri brgyad): / shing gakhan paco po mkhas pas shing gi 'khrul 'khor byas// skyes pa bud med 'dra bya ba thams cad byed// de bzhin shes rab spyod ma khas byang chub pa
331a2(khri brgyad): yangs rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed // de ltar spyod mkhas rnams lnga sna tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar ba bdud cing phyag kyang 'tshal bar byed// 
331a3(khri brgyad): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed kyang // man tan bsngags pa'i 'phreng bas yongasu brjod par mdzod// gaN+DI klung gi bya steng zhing na son rnams/ 
331a4(khri brgyad): kun bdud gyur par longasu brtag bzung te// ba spu nyag ma re re ji snyed sprul byas kyang // de dag kun gyis mkhas la bar chang bya mi nus// rnam bzhis byang chubs su
331a5(khri brgyad): dpa' mkhas pa stobs ldan pa// thub par dka' zhing bdud bzhis bskyod par mi nus te// stong par gnas dang sa na longasu mi gtong dang // ji skad smras bzhin
331a6(khri brgyad): byed dang bde gshegs byin rlabs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs lum shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'dri// 'chang tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mos byed cing // bsam
331a7(khri brgyad): ba thag pas bsgrub par mngon du brtson byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir mngon zhugs rig par bya// de bzhin nyid kyi gan su chos dbyings nyer mi 'gro// dper
331a8(khri brgyad): na bar snang sprin ga nas med gnas pa bzhin// rig sngags 'chang ba dmigs med nags sems mkha' gro che// me tog shing phyir sngags 'byin rlabs byed// de ltar
331b1(khri brgyad): spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// rtog par byed dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmigs mi 'gyur// 'chang bar byed dang chos nyid mthong ba mi dmigs pa/ 
331b2(khri brgyad): 'di ni zhi 'dod yon tan dga' ba'i gnas pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kyi dgra bcom rnam thar ma gtogs par// gnas pa 'dzin nyan thos rang rgyal bcas pa yi// 
331b3(khri brgyad): gnas pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rab zhi bde ldan pa// ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med pa yin// mdab chags na mkhar gnas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ma yin// nya ni
331b4(khri brgyad): chun gnas kyang 'chubs te 'chi ba med// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan sto bas ngag gis// pha rol son pa stong gnas mya ngan 'da' mi 'gyur/ 
331b5(khri brgyad): sems can kun gyi yon tan mchog 'a gro gang 'dod pas// chos kyi sbyin pa rab mchog dam pa sbyin bya zhing // phan mdzad rnams kyi gnas pa mchog 'dir sten
331b6(khri brgyad): cig dang // sangs rgyas la shes mchog du rmad byung mchog reg 'gyur// bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod pa// bslab pa ji snyed kun gyi mchog
331b7(khri brgyad): dang gong na mang // mkhas pa gang zhig bslab kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'dir slobs// chos mdzad dam pa 'di ni ga
331b8(khri brgyad): gyi phul du byung // 'jig rten dag nas sa rgyas rigs kyi bde skyid mdzod// 'das dang ma byin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams// de dag 'di la byung
332a1(khri brgyad): chos dbyings zad mi 'gyur// shing dang 'bras bu me tog nags tshal ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad sa la yang dag byung zhing 'thon// 'on kyang sa
332a2(khri brgyad): la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// skyo ba med cing yongasu mi nyams rnam rtog med// sangs rgyas nyan thos rang rgyal bcas pa ji snyed dang // 'jig rten kun na lha dang brda
332a3(khri brgyad): sgyid chos yod pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // shes rab nam kyang zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// sems can tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur
332a4(khri brgyad): ji snyed pa// de kun ma rig las byung bde bar ga shegs pas gsungs rkyen rnams tshogs nas sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rab tu byung // 'khrul 'khor zad pa
332a5(khri brgyad): med cing ma rig 'phel ba med// ye shes chu la sgo thabs kyi rtsa ba ji snyed pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // rkyen rnams chogs
332a6(khri brgyad): nas las kyi 'khrul 'khor rab tu byung // shes rab pha rol phyin pa zad pa 'am 'phel ba med// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byung 'di// 
332a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyis ni 'byung med rtogs pa de// dper na sprin gyis sgrib med nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar// mi rig 'gegs par bsal nas rang byung thob par 'gyur// mthu
332a8(khri brgyad): chen ldan pa dag ni bsam gtan bzhir gnas kyang // rten por byed pa ma yin gnas par byed pa med// 'on kyang bsam gtan bzhi po 'di dag rten yin zhing / 
332b1(khri brgyad): thob par gyur nas byang chub dam pa mchog kyang 'thob// shes rab mchog thob pa dag bsam gtan gnas pa myong // gzugs med cing 'dzin dam pa bzhi
332b2(khri brgyad): po rnams kyang myong // bsam gtan 'di dag byang chub da phan byed 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' zag pa zang phyir slob pa min// bsam gtani ting 'dzin
332b3(khri brgyad): la gnas nas mtshan ma med// de la gnas rnams gal te lus ni zhig gyur nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'dod pa'i khams yang skye ste// 'di ni yon tan sogs
332b4(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo mtshar rma du byung // dper na 'dzam gling mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa'i// lha yul lha'i khang pa dam pa rnyed gyur cing // mthong nas de yis der ni yul rnams
332b5(khri brgyad): yongs bzung ba// de dag gnas par mi byed phyir ya nga 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog 'chang // rnal 'byor brtson pa bsam gtan ting
332b6(khri brgyad): 'dzin gnas nas// phyir yang 'dod pa'i khamasu gnas te god pa med// chu la pad+ma bzhin du byis pa'i chos mi gnas// sems can longasu smin par bya dang zhing sbyang dang / 
332b7(khri brgyad): rol phyir 'di yongs rdzogs bya ba ma gtogs par// bdag nyid chen po gzugs med khams skyo mi byed// byang chub yon tan pha ro phyin rnams nyams par 'gyuraro// dpar
332b8(khri brgyad): na mi zhig rin chen gter rnams rnyed gyur cing // de la 'dod pa'i blo ni bskyed pa ma byas la// des kyang dus gzhan zhig na de dag yongs drangs shing // blangs nas khyim du bcug
333a1(khri brgyad): te chags par byed pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems thabs mkhas bsam gtan bzhi// ting 'dzin zhi ba dga' bde sbyin byed thod gyur la// bsam
333a2(khri brgyad): gtan bde dang bsam gtan ting 'dzin thob btang ste// 'gro la snying rtse ldan nga phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin bsam gtan gan+da
333a3(khri brgyad): dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo skyed na// mnyam par ma bzhag rgod cing sems g.yengs gyur pa ste// sas rgyas yon tan yongs nyams mnyan pa gru zhig bzhi// / 
333a4(khri brgyad): gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro// reg dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la brtson gyur kyang // dgra bcom rang rgyal theg dral byang chub sems dpa' na// dpa
333a5(khri brgyad): po rtag tu mnyam bzhag yin par shes par bya// san rnam dag sems can gang zag gzhan gyi phyir// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la brtson zhing rnam par rgyu/ 
333a6(khri brgyad): dper na bran mo bum thogs dbang med rje do'i dbang // de bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun gyi dbang gis 'gro// spro ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu rdegs kyang rung // bran pa rdza
333a7(khri brgyad): bo la ni zlogs pa'i tshig mi smra// bdag la des na gnod pa bya sa 'ong snyam nas// shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis 'jigs pas zil gyis non// de bzhin byang chub che du byang chub
333a8(khri brgyad): mchog zhugs pa// 'gro ba kun la dran gyur de bzhin gnas par bya// lung gi yon tan rtogs pa yongasu rdzogs mi byed// shing las mi byung ba yis shing de sregs pa bzhin
333b1(khri brgyad): bdag gi bde ba btang nas rab med sems kyis// sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par rtson// bu cig pa la ma ni rim 'gro byed pa ltar// bsam pa zag pas
333b2(khri brgyad): byed de skyo med gnas pa bzhin// sems can don dang zhing sbyong brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod sems shing // skyo ba'i blo ni rdul tsam
333b3(khri brgyad): skye bar ma'i gyur pa// de ni g.yal med brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la brtson// byang chub sems dpa' mi mkhas bskal pa bya grangs la// gal te ring bar 'du shes sdug
333b4(khri brgyad): bsngal byang chub bsgrub// chos sgrub byed pa 'itshe na rab tu sdug bsngal 'gyur// de tsha brtson 'grus pha rol phyin nyams le lo can// zhi ba bla na med pa thob par
333b5(khri brgyad): bya snyam to// byang chub mchog tu sems skyed thog mar bskyed byas nas// nyin dang mtshan du de la yid cig gnas byed pa// mkhas pa gsal ba brtson 'grus
333b6(khri brgyad): brtsams par rig par bya// gal te la la 'di skad r-i rab ri shig la// phyi nas byang chub mchog thob bya zhes smras pa las// gal te skye ba'i blo skyes ched du byed gyur na// de tsha
333b7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' la lo rnyed par 'gyur// ji ste chung zad 'di lta ci smos blo skyes te// skad cig tsam la ri rab thal bar rlag snyam na// byang chub sems dpa' mtha
333b8(khri brgyad): pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste// ring por mi thogs 'dren par byang chub thob par 'gyur// yongasu smin par byas la 'gro ba'i don bya zhes// gal te lus dang ngag dang yid
334a1(khri brgyad): kyi brtson byed na// bdag du 'du shes gnas pa le lo rnyed 'gyur te// thang mkhyen pa nyid las ring 'gyur gnams bzhin// gang tshe lus dang sems da
334a2(khri brgyad): sen 'du shes med// 'du shes rnam par log nas chos gnyis mi spyod pa// 'di ni byang chub ma nyams mchog zhi tshol ba yi// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad
334a3(khri brgyad): pas gsungs// gzhan las ngan du brjod pa'i tshig rtsub thos gyur nas// su smra su thos gang na su'i gang tang zhes// ma lus mgu byed byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de// 
334a4(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol phyin dang ldan pa mdzangs pa yin// byang chub se de gang zhig bzod pa'i legs chos ldan// gang zhig stong gsum rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten khams/ 
334a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra be tsem rang rgyal ngul byas pa// sbyin pa'i phung pos de'i bsod nam sa char mi dad// bzod la gnas pa'i lus ni yongasu dag 'gyur
334a6(khri brgyad): te sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang mthu stobs pa mtha' yas// san rnams la dad pa'i chos rab sgrogs par byed// bzod pa mkhas la 'jig rten 'din dga' bar
334a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur// gal te san la las tsan dan snyam bkang ste// bla ma phangs pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang // gzhan zhig med mngag mgo la 'thor ba gnyi ga la// 
334a8(khri brgyad): yis mnyam zhing snyoms pa'i yid ni spyad par bya// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas// sems bskyed de ni byang chub mchog du yangs bsdus
334b1(khri brgyad): dpa' bo bzod pas 'jig rten kun na dgra bcom dang // rang rgyal sems can khams kyi bzod kun zil gyis non// bzod byed 'di snyam du yang sems ni bskyed bya ste// sama?
334b2(khri brgyad): dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal mang // 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis mi 'dod gnod myong na// byang chub che du ji phyi rang bzod mi bya snyam// lcag dbyig mtshon
334b3(khri brgyad): dang gsad dang bcing dang rdeg pa dang // mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gcod dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal ji snyed bdag goso bzod snyam pa// byang chub sems dpa'
334b4(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas// zhi ba 'dod pa rnams ni khrims kyis byung ba yin// stobs bcu/ 'i spyod yul gnas shing tshul khrims nyams pa med// sdom pa'i
334b5(khri brgyad): bya ba ji snyed kun gyi rje su 'jug/ san kun la phan phyir de yang byang chub bsngo// gal te rang rgya la dgra bcom byang chub 'dod skyed na// tshul khrims 'chal cing
334b6(khri brgyad): tshul mkhas de bzhin spyod pa nyams// ji ste byang chub zhi ba mchog tu yongs bsngo na// 'dod yon brtson yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas// chos gang nges pa'i byang
334b7(khri brgyad): chu ba yon tan 'byung med pa// de ni yon tan chos don ldan pa'i tshul khrims yin// chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa// 'di ni tshul khrims
334b8(khri brgyad): 'chal ces rnam par 'dren pas gsungs// gal te byang chub sede' 'dod yon lnga spyod la// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste// sangs rgyas 'grub
335a1(khri brgyad): bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed pa// mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya// gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu// spyod
335a2(khri brgyad): cing rang rgyal dgra bcom nyid la 'dod bskyed na// de tshe tshul khrims skyon byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin// sems skyed de ni phas pham kyang shin tu lci// tshul khrims bkrung sa
335a3(khri brgyad): byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngol// de'i rlom sems med de bdag bstod mi byed cing // nga'i 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs spangs pa// tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas
335a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' brjod// gal te byang chub se dar rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa// san gas sa das 'chal ces// sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul khrims
335a5(khri brgyad): 'chal// tshul khrims nyams shing de la yongs dag/ tshul khrims med// gong la bdag gi 'du shes/ seMn 'du shes med// 'du shes 'dod chags dral la sdom pa ci
335a6(khri brgyad): phyir med// gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yin rlom sems med// 'di ni tshul khrims sdom par rnam dar dran par gsungs// san dag pa gang zhig 'di lta'i khrims ldan
335a7(khri brgyad): pa sdug dang mi sdug kun la lta ba med pa yin// mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang med// bdag pa zad gtong nang rtag tu zhen pa med// chos rnams rang bzhin
335a8(khri brgyad): bdag med la marlar shes nas// bdag gi sha yang gtong zhing zhen pa'i sems med na// de las phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos ci dgos gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas min te/ 
335b1(khri brgyad): bdag dang bdag gir dngos por 'du shes 'dod chags 'gyur// blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo lta ga la yod// ser sna yi dwags gan su skye bar byed pa ste// ji ste mir skyes na lang
335b2(khri brgyad): nga tshe dbul por 'gyur// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' seMn dbu lnga zhes na// gtong la mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhug par gtong // gling bzhi legs par ngargyan pa mchil ma'i
335b3(khri brgyad): thal ba 'dra// byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de ltar ma ni// byang chub seder mkhas pa gsal ba sbyin byan na// srid pa gsum gyi sen ji snyed pasam byas te// de dag kun
335b4(khri brgyad): la sbyin 'di byin par gyur cig sems// de yanga' gro ba'i don phyir byang chub mchog du bsngo// sbyin pa byin nas dngos por gnas par byed pa med// de ni na du'ang rnam
335b5(khri brgyad): par smin la re ba med// de ltar gtong ba mkhas la thad gtong ba ste// chung ngu gtong la dpag tu med pa mang por 'gyur// srid pa gsum na san ma lus ji skad pa// 
335b6(khri brgyad): brtag pa bzung ste de dag thad kyis// 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la// bskal pa mtha' yis sbyin byin nyan thos legs tshol na// byang chub sada' mkha
335b7(khri brgyad): pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis// de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos por yid rang nas// sen don du byang chub mchog rabo longs bsngo na// yongasu bsngo bas 'gro ba thams cad
335b8(khri brgyad): zil gyis non// nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang // rin chen bai DUr+ya gcig de kun zil gyis non// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun/ rdza
336a1(khri brgyad): su yid rang byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non// gal te byang chub sengs 'gro la sbyin byin na// de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po phangs med na// de las dge ba'i
336a2(khri brgyad): rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel 'gyur te// sprin med zla ba yar ngo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byang chub so'i sbyin pa yi dwags 'gro ba gcod // dbul ba dang ni de bzhin nyon mo
336a3(khri brgyad): thams cad gcod// rnam par rgyu che long spyod mtha' yas langs pa 'thob// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can sbyin pas longs smin byed// khrims kyis dud 'gro 'gro ba
336a4(khri brgyad): du ma'i ngo bo spongad // dus rnams kun tu mi khom brgyad kyang rnam par spyod// bzod pas gzugs bzang song ma pa rgya chen zhib 'gyur te// gsar mdog sdug cing
336a5(khri brgyad): 'gro bas lta ba'i 'o su 'gyur/ brtson 'gru sa kyis ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur/ rgyal ba'i ngang mdzod ye shes mtha' las thob par 'gyur// bsam
336a6(khri brgyad): gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan smad pa 'dir// rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon pa ri sgrub/ shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes na/ ngan song gsuM
336a7(khri brgyad): po'i khams gsum dag las shin tu 'da'/ mi'i 'dren pa'i 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas na// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'gro la chos kyang ston// chos ni yongs rdzogs/ 
336a8(khri brgyad): byas nas byang chub sa der de// yongs dag zhing dang sen dag pa yong su 'dzin// sangs rgyas rgyu dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yong su 'dzin// de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang tshus+ya kun la
336b1(khri brgyad): su 'dzin// byang chub lam 'di shes rab bstan phyir brjod pa ste// 'jig rten dag na nad gsor byed pa sman pa'i mchog/ ming ni yon tan tha~Md sdud pa'i byang chub lam// lam 'di
336b2(khri brgyad): sems can tha~Md kyis ni thob gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sdud pa tshig su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgya cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// 
336b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// bam po sde bcu rtsa brgyad pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad po 'di dag gsungs nas// tshe dang ldan pa
336b4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
336b5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo des/ ji ltar byang chub sa de'i sada' chen po rtag tu ngu/ da ltar de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra
336b6(khri brgyad): dbyangs mi bzad pa sgrog pa'i drung na/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongasu btsal ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces
336b7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sede sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu des/ 
336b8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu tshol ba na/ ji ltar yongasu btsal ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
337a1(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen po rtag tu ngu sngon/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu tshol ba na/ lus la ched cher mi 'dzin/ 
337a2(khri brgyad): srog la mi lta rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshig su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par longs bya tshul bas yongasu btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs tshol zhing / 'drag
337a3(khri brgyad): dgon pa zhig du phyin pa na/ bar snang la sgra thos par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogasu song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas lus ngal ba
337a4(khri brgyad): yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan
337a5(khri brgyad): mo yid la byed pa mo skyed pa dang / nyin mo yi dal byed pa mi skyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar song shig/ nang da
337a6(khri brgyad): phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yon ma blta bar song shi ga/ nub dang steng dang 'og dang / phyogs mtshom su'ang ma blta bar song
337a7(khri brgyad): shig rigs kyi bu ci nas 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yas pa dang / ci nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
337a8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song shig/ gang las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyuraro// ci nas nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
337b1(khri brgyad): rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni 'khor ba la spyod// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
337b2(khri brgyad): pa rje su mi 'thob po// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sada'i sede' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di skad ces smraso// de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sen thaMd la
337b3(khri brgyad): snang bar byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thaMd sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyiraro// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra ngos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di
337b4(khri brgyad): skad ces smraso// rtag tu ngu lag so lag so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra tha sa te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyi dang / mtshan ma med
337b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos dag la mos pa bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma longasu spang bar bya// dngos po
337b6(khri brgyad): yongasu spang bar bya// sems can du lta ba yongasu spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa
337b7(khri brgyad): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon po med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya/ brten par
337b8(khri brgyad): bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos sgra
338a1(khri brgyad): pa'i lus la yod pa zos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 'di thos pa de la rigs kyi bu khyod ston par 'jugs
338a2(khri brgyad): bskyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar byas te/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin
338a3(khri brgyad): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa dag

338a6(khri brgyad): slong chos smrab la ston pa yin par 'ju shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin
338a7(khri brgyad): 'brang bar mi bya'o// khyed kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhini 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtags pa

338b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la rten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sida' chen po rnams ni gang la yang ma chags

338b5(khri brgyad): na/ 'di lta ste/ chos tha da kun nas nyon mong sa pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir/ chos

339a1(khri brgyad): phyir 'gyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyobs dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi

339a6(khri brgyad): skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ brang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dperan skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig
339a7(khri brgyad): po 'chi ba'i dus byas ni sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyi bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gau togs par

339b5(khri brgyad): pa 'di lta bus rjesu 'brang zhing shar phyogs nyid song shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan spros ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna
339b6(khri brgyad): bdun las byas pa'i rab rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta lnga'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis longasu bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du
339b7(khri brgyad): dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis geng ba grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris

340a1(khri brgyad): / shing bskor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' la ba rnams ni 'dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa mdara' yang zad
340a2(khri brgyad): kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras bu chags pa mnga' lab las shing skyes pa thang las kyang rin po che'i thag byung bas mnga' yab
340a3(khri brgyad): gcig shos gzhan dang 'brel po/ grong khyer thaMngad gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas khebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yor kha de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid

340a5(khri brgyad): 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa longa'ang ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des san de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyad
340a6(khri brgyad): grong khyer de kho ra yug tu 'ongs chu 'bab pas gang zhing chu ha cang yang mi grang ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba ngag yod// chung la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub pa rin po chosna
340a7(khri brgyad): bdun gyis gru dag yod der sa ni dgazhugs nas rtsi dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o// chu de tha~Md kyang me tog sung pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog rigs
340a8(khri brgyad): che zhing bzang la dri zhim pa'idid ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las den med pa gang yang
340b1(khri brgyad): mngo// grong khyer de'i nang na bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ bskyed mos tshal da dag rer

340b3(khri brgyad): rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug padag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khabs shing me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu te dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag thad kyang chu zhing du shing rta'i pang lo tsam

341a1(khri brgyad): rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug parab rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng bdun gyis longasu bskor ba zhig yod/ khang pa den khang pa'i longs spyod du rtag tu rab dka'
341a2(khri brgyad): bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan bral ba zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i bskyed mos tshal dang bskyed mos tshal po na yod/ bskyed mas

341a5(khri brgyad): ni dr-iDUr+ya las byas/ nges bzhi pa ni shal las byas/ nang gis gzhi ni kaM ke su la byas pa'i bye ma brdal ba ste/ rdzing du de dag re re la yang them skas thim pa
341a6(khri brgyad): rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa thadad pas brgyan pa brgya dang rlung med/ tham skas de dag zang kyi bar nas kyang la dzam+bu'i tshu ngo'i gser rgyu shing ljon pa dag skyes rdzing bu de dag zad kyi
341a7(khri brgyad): ni me tog ku mu ta dang / u pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyi khebs shing dang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / ba~M zhad rnams skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me to/ 
341a8(khri brgyad): gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du ltung bas rdzing bu de zad kyi chu 'angabatsan dan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog
341b1(khri brgyad): dang ldan dri dang lda no// de na byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing
341b2(khri brgyad): 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod// grong khyer de na sen skyes pa dang bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang bskyed mos tshal lam rdzing bu de dag rtag tu
341b3(khri brgyad): dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga'i zhing dga' mgur spyad// yang byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig
341b4(khri brgyad): tu rtse dga' ste dga' mgur spyod cing de na dus ga sum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// sa mas can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang
341b5(khri brgyad): grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub se 'a sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags kyi khrigs ra gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / baiDUR+Ya'i rkang pa dang / shel
341b6(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa gcugs pa/ shing nga la bting ba/ stan nang tshangs can bting ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams
341b7(khri brgyad): steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing / de ltar chos la gus pa re byed pas sa phyogs de kho ra yug kyang me togo kha dog ga mngon par gtor cing
341b8(khri brgyad): sa phyogs de yang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed pa// de la byang chub sedar sede' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
342a1(khri brgyad): phyin pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag de lta bur gus par byed cing byang chub senga' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
342a2(khri brgyad): panyan to// de na gang dag nyan nga'i lha dang mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po srog chags stong phrag mang po srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni lung
342a3(khri brgyad): nod/ la la ni kha don byed/ la la ni yi ger 'bri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed/ seMn de dag thams cad log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med
342a4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song shig dang /
