342a7(khri brgyad): des kyang sngon da ltar tshol ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma chad par song shig dang / ring po
342a8(khri brgyad): mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sede'i sede' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yin
342b1(khri brgyad): bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar byed pa zug rngu 'byin
342b2(khri brgyad): pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du byang chub seng sede' chen po rtag tu du yang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed cing / chos
342b3(khri brgyad): gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam du sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yang la mi bye // 
342b4(khri brgyad): de nas byang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen po rtag tu ngus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thaMd la mi gnas pa'i 'a du shes bskyed nas/ tingange 'dzin gyi sgo mngon du
342b5(khri brgyad): gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par ba lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid po dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
342b6(khri brgyad): dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos tha~Mng 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes
342b7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / chos thad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / thams cad mi dmigs pa zhwa
342b8(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya
343a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tingange 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / son thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thad
343a2(khri brgyad): tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems can tha~Md kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjesu song ba zhes bya
343a3(khri brgyad): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sgra dang tshig 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin dang / mkhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i
343a4(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting
343a5(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya/ ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa 'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / na mkha'
343a6(khri brgyad): dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
343a7(khri brgyad): dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
343a8(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / sang+ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
343b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / snying po thad kyi rjes
343b2(khri brgyad): song ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'a
343b3(khri brgyad): dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par
343b4(khri brgyad): blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar 'gyur ba'i thibs pa thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
343b5(khri brgyad): dang chos tha~Md mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting la dzin dang / chags pa thaMd las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / le lo tha~Mng dang bral ba zhes
343b6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bdud kyi
343b7(khri brgyad): dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon pa ra ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i
343b8(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamos
344a1(khri brgyad): / rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med bdag byang chub sengal se 'a chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu sngon
344a2(khri brgyad): padag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis leg so zhes bya babyin nas/ dbugs dbyung ba mdzad/ tshig 'di skad kyang gsung so// rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang byang chub
344a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te/ longs tshol ba na yang ting 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/ ting 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes
344a4(khri brgyad): ra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to// nged kyis kyang ting 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang / 
344a5(khri brgyad): rang bzhin la bltas na gang mnyam par gan ga ba 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ byang chub tu spyod pa 'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
344a6(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong // rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos
344a7(khri brgyad): gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan su
344a8(khri brgyad): cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting
344b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin bla na med pa dang / yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rje su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad bzung ba'am/ mtha'
344b2(khri brgyad): bstan par mi nus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa
344b3(khri brgyad): mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yino// khyod kyis dge ba'i
344b4(khri brgyad): gnyen la shin tu bus pa bskyed par bya'o// pa sa par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du blan
344b5(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gags pa de dag la byang chub seMngar sada' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di
344b6(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to// bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sada' sems
344b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su smin par byas shing / yong su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa dang thabs mtha
344b8(khri brgyad): pa la bslab so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyed longasu 'dzin pa'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen yin gyis des khyod la ci bsgo ba bzhin du rung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub
345a1(khri brgyad): sa chen po chos 'phags la skal pa'am/ skal pa gnyis sam/ skal pa brgya 'am/ skal pa stong ngam/ de las ldag par yang mgo 'thong bzhin du rdzog
345a2(khri brgyad): shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa dngag
345a3(khri brgyad): thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis ting 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes
345a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi la phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub
345a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' seng 'a chen po rtag tu du dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting dzin de dag las langs te langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sam
345a6(khri brgyad): so de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mthong bas rab tu gdung shing mi dga'
345a7(khri brgyad): bar gyur to// yang de 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sengar sada' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la
345a8(khri brgyad): lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag yongasu 'dzin pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sad mda' chen
345b1(khri brgyad): po chos 'phags kyi drung du du mngon par song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snya mo// 
345b2(khri brgyad): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po rtag tu ngus byang chub sems dpa' soda' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang dad pa dang ri mo dang / gus par bya ba nye bar
345b3(khri brgyad): gzhag ste/ nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du semaso// bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur bstir bya bas byang chub se der sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ 
345b4(khri brgyad): dra dag ni dbul te bdag gis byang chub senga' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bangag bkur bi stor bya ba'i gos rin po che 'am/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mug tig gam/ 
345b5(khri brgyad): bISh+ma 'am/ dung ngam/ mno shel lam/ byi rul ma/ dngul lam/ sa le sbram 'am/ me tog gam/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ gdug
345b6(khri brgyad): pa de lta bu yang bdag la med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par
345b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am/ rangs pa yang mi skye'o snyam sem so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog tu du de lta bu'i yon tan ngag dang / bla ma la gus
345b8(khri brgyad): ba yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / de grong bar gyi dbus su 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis lus bcings la de
346a1(khri brgyad): rin gyis byang chubs deng sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bltar byara'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi sus stong zhig cing zad / bcos pa 'kho
346a2(khri brgyad): dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang du san dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpab tu med pa dag myang yang 'dis bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can
346a3(khri brgyad): chen po la bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir ma yi ni sna mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i se 'i chen po rtag tu dus/ grong bar 'dug snga mi su 'dzud mi su 'dod ces sgra skyugs shing skad
346a4(khri brgyad): thos de nas bdud sdig can 'od snyam du sems te/ byang chub so der sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
346a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po tsha 'phags la bkur bstir byed cing / bya nga chub sems dpa' sanga' chen po shes rab kyi phar la tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na myur du bla na med
346a6(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thos pa rgya mtsho rjesu thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyis lha dag gis mo thub par 'gyur/ yon
346a7(khri brgyad): tan thad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjesu thob par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa longasu 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der sa na mang po dag gi don byed par
346a8(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed sems can gzhan dag kyang nga
346b1(khri brgyad): yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sengangs der chen
346b2(khri brgyad): po rtag tu ngus/ mi su 'dod su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur pa de lta bur yongasu bsgrib so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seMnga'i chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe
346b3(khri brgyad): bdag nyo bar rnyed pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' seMde' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstis
346b4(khri brgyad): bya snyam na lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed/ kye ma bdag ni rnyed pa ngan rnyed do snya mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub se 'as
346b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bang ga gi lus yongasu btang ba lhag par bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chubs
346b6(khri brgyad): dpa' senga' chen po rtag tu dul bdag gis bgam par bya'o snyam ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin+da bram ze'i khye'u'i chu byad mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' soda' chen
346b7(khri brgyad): rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sade chen po rtag tu ngul 'od skad ces smos// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar ling mi dga' zhing yid gdung la ma
346b8(khri brgyad): ma byung ba ci nyes/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod na lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas/ de
347a1(khri brgyad): lo ba 'di snyam du semaso// kye mang ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar bum bcos te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chu
347a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sede' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bsti bya snyam na bdag gis lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed snya mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' senga' chen po
347a3(khri brgyad): rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu kho bo la mis ni bya ba med kyi/ kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed// der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang rkang dag kho bo la dgos na/ 
347a4(khri brgyad): rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' songa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di bdag gi snying dang rus pa
347a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / rkang nyo bar rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gi rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed// bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rnams la yong su rdzogs
347a6(khri brgyad): par gyur to snyam ste/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smra so// bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di lnga
347a7(khri brgyad): khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin// des de la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin tu ci 'dod sbyin zhes bya ba dang / des de la 'di skad ces smraso// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongasu
347a8(khri brgyad): bting ba de mi ma mi byed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' se tshon ba rtag tu dumatshon rnon po thogs nas lag pa g.yas ba drug ste khrag gzugs// botshwa gams pa na ma
347b1(khri brgyad): par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' se dA chen po rtag tu brla sha med
347b2(khri brgyad): par btog nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid lta bu'i natsha dag byed pa bdag
347b3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub senga' sems dpa
347b4(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir khyed bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khra gdang rus pa dang rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu ngus pa
347b5(khri brgyad): mo de la 'di skad ces smras// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya'o// rapha gas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
347b6(khri brgyad): chos 'phags la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi
347b7(khri brgyad): snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur bstir bye bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bu ma
347b8(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu de ni gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs na bla na med pa yang dag
348a1(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha dog ste bu yang 'thob pa
348a2(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po
348a3(khri brgyad): dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par
348a4(khri brgyad): shes pa lnga dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rang rnam par dag pa bsam gyis
348a5(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcud nga/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i le shwe kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang
348a6(khri brgyad): gis son thams cad la kun tu bgo bshar bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// de na/ sa tshong dpon gyi bu mo ngas byang chub se de se 'a chen
348a7(khri brgyad): po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongasu brjod pa ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang
348a8(khri brgyad): skal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongasu btang bar bya ba yin no/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher longasu brjod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang
348b1(khri brgyad): gis byang chub sede sade' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUR+Ya 'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam
348b2(khri brgyad): me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos de khyod la sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang
348b3(khri brgyad): khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sa 'a chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la bdag kyang dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dag
348b4(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sa bram ze'i khye'u cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ bad gnyid kyi lus su byang chub senge'i sada' chen po
348b5(khri brgyad): rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yi dam la brtan pa ni leg so legs// 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin ga
348b6(khri brgyad): pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs
348b7(khri brgyad): rdzogs par mdzad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// rigs kyi bu kho bo la snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang gis bya ba
348b8(khri brgyad): med kyi/ kho bos khyod la sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la dam pa ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya/ des de la smras pa
349a1(khri brgyad): brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa yang dag bdag la brtsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di ni kho bo'i yul du gyur pa ma yin
349a2(khri brgyad): te yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ dam pa gzhan slong shig/ byang chub sengar rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yong su rdzogs
349a3(khri brgyad): par bya ba'i gnas pa 'di la ni lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gis
349a4(khri brgyad): bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
349a5(khri brgyad): lung bstan cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen ce na/ bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon bzhin du gyur cig ces byas
349a6(khri brgyad): pa dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pas byang chub sede'i sada' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi bzhin du gan+da
349a7(khri brgyad): par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sang chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spongs pa ma skyes nas/ de ni
349a8(khri brgyad): snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rdul 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu chur shog/ kho mo'i khyim ga
349b1(khri brgyad): la der dong ngo // kho mos pa ma las nor blangs te/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
349b2(khri brgyad): de la'ang bkur bsti bya ba bzhi no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas de rang gi khyim gang na ba der dong // de nas tsha
349b3(khri brgyad): dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin pas/ pa ma la 'di skad ces smraso// yab yum gser dang dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 
349b4(khri brgyad): me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis su
349b5(khri brgyad): ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig brgya ra gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sedar chen po/ gtu du dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub sa de
349b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi dpa'i sla du mchi'o// de yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyu ro// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smraso// / 
349b7(khri brgyad): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de su zhig/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dang lha'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis
349b8(khri brgyad): te rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can tha~Mng 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpa
350a1(khri brgyad): / tu ma mchis pa las thar par dgyi bar 'tshal pas chos 'chol ba'i srang bdag nyid btsongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal
350a2(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' seM 'a chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bsti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyob su yang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid che ba de nas/ mi dga'
350a3(khri brgyad): sems shing mchis te/ des nga ni lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba ma rnye do zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugasu bsgyur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu
350a4(khri brgyad): khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang / rtag tu du nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'o se 'a chen
350a5(khri brgyad): po ches 'phags de la yang bkur bster bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyiraro zhes bgyis pa dang / 
350a6(khri brgyad): brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugasu bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smra so// khyod ning mi 'dod de/ nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang rkang ngag dgos
350a7(khri brgyad): zhes dgyes pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma bsad par de la 'di skad sbyinau zhes smras pas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzags brla'i sha
350a8(khri brgyad): btogs te rus pa gcog tu song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang rkang sbyi no// snyam nas/ de khrag gzags pa dang / bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas ma
350b1(khri brgyad): ste de la bdag 'di snyam bgyi do// mi 'di ci'i slad 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsa dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i tha du mchis nas 'di skad bgyi so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid
350b2(khri brgyad): kyi lus kyi khrag gzugs pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying dang / rus pa dang rkang sbyi no// de ci'i phyir zhe na
350b3(khri brgyad): dan dngul ting la nar gzhan ci yang med nas mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dzad pa'i phyi
350b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' seM 'a chen po chos 'phags la la nga bkur bsti bya'o zhes mchi nas/ bdag gis 'di skad
350b5(khri brgyad): du bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam ba'am/ khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ba dag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bas mag+ni
350b6(khri brgyad): mi khyab dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las nges par 'byung bar 'gyuro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
350b7(khri brgyad): tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang rab tu mgung chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid/ rigs kyi du 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro ba gying
350b8(khri brgyad): pa ni shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste/ ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongasu gtong na bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la
351a1(khri brgyad): ci'i phyir chos la mtsha dang mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gang ba stam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ce
351a2(khri brgyad): bgyi so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
351a3(khri brgyad): la bkur bstir bya ba'i nor mang po de dag khyod la sbyin// bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sanga' chen po chos 'phags ga la bder mchi'o// 
351a4(khri brgyad): bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongasu brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa de dag bdag gis thob par
351a5(khri brgyad): bgyi'o// zhes bgyis shing mchis na yab yum gyis pa/ ra gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang
351a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' se 'a chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// bam po lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa/ ngan
351a7(khri brgyad): bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu de'i dkara' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na chos de dag ni gcig tu ngas par bsam gyis mi khyab
351a8(khri brgyad): pa 'jig rten thaMd las bye brag tu 'phags pa/ sems can thaMd bde bathob par byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na khyod
351b1(khri brgyad): nged kyis gnang gis/ bu mo dang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sedar senga' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mcho du nged kyang 'gros nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye ba zhig de nas bu mo
351b2(khri brgyad): des byang chub sems dpa' senga' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smra so// bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs
351b3(khri brgyad): gang gi yang bar chad mi bgyid // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya yang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to// rgyan gyis brgyan
351b4(khri brgyad): nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug pa dang spos dang // me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs
351b5(khri brgyad): gser dang dngul gyi me tog dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag thogs te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas/ byang
351b6(khri brgyad): chub senga'i sa ngar chen po rtag tu ngu drang shing rtagacig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdor nas/ pha ma
351b7(khri brgyad): la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba de log su dong ste/ mthar gyis song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' senga' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring po zhig nas grong khyer
351b8(khri brgyad): spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba blta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa 'ongs rim pa
352a1(khri brgyad): bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa/ bde ba lo/ 
352a2(khri brgyad): legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba grong ba dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyam ming ba dang / bar ba rab tu
352a3(khri brgyad): zam pa btags par legs par byas pa mthong // de'i dbus kyi bzhi 'don byang chub seda' sanga' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / 
352a4(khri brgyad): 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste dper na dge slong bsam gtan
352a5(khri brgyad): dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhug/ das pa bzhino// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub seng
352a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gi mi che'o snyam nas/ de nas shing rta de la sa babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang bu mo lnga brgya de dag
352a7(khri brgyad): kyang mnyam du shing rta de las babaso// de nas byang chub sengar soda' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bangar te/ 
352a8(khri brgyad): bkad pa tsha de med pa dang / byang chub sade sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags gal ba der dang // de'i tshe byang chub sedeng sade chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pa'i/ 
352b1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ tsanang na dmar pos brgyan cing me tog gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste// khang bu brdegs pa
352b2(khri brgyad): grwa bzhinar bu rin po che bzhi gzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed// bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste shes ra
352b3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshang par bya ba'i phyir a ka ru nag po 'phel dog gis bajug par byed// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs
352b4(khri brgyad): nga'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi gzhag nas// de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi gleg sa bam bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs
352b5(khri brgyad): pa de yang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa nga' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu mo
352b6(khri brgyad): lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshod med pas brgyan pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ngo // lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man da
352b7(khri brgyad): ra ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gsar bye dang / lha'i dngul sim ma ngag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la mthor/ mngon par 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor ba
352b8(khri brgyad): lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos// mthong shing thos nas byang chub seder sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i dbang po khyod lha stong
353a1(khri brgyad): thag dum dag can mo sa chags pa dim kyi phying matog san nga bdag dang / na nakyi bye ba dag gas pa shid / 'don pa
353a2(khri brgyad): par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sibastan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir brdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub seng sangan chen po rtag
353a3(khri brgyad): tu ngul 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub senga' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lum yongasu 'dron pa len te/ 'di la bslabs pa
353a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa'i senge chen po dag yon tan thamasaHdkyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du
353a5(khri brgyad): 'thob par 'gyur ba yin na khyod mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la
353a6(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces smras// ko'u shi kau shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ byang chub sede'i se 'i chen po rnams kyi lum/ yongasu la dran pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 
353a7(khri brgyad): de khang brtsegs pa de'i nang na/ gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya bzhu bas bris pa/ byang chub sems dpa' senga' chen po chos 'phags kyi rgya bdun gyis btab nas bzhag sa
353a8(khri brgyad): nged kyis khyod la bstan par bka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng 'a chen po rtag tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas/ de dag gi
353b1(khri brgyad): me tog dang / me tog 'phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
353b2(khri brgyad): ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' seMr
353b3(khri brgyad): chen po ches 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' singa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / ma
353b4(khri brgyad): tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar ma chod pa byas nas/ byang chub sade
353b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong te phyin na// chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sa mas dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ me tog dang / 
353b6(khri brgyad): bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / du
353b7(khri brgyad): gyi me tog dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor te// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sanga' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ 
353b8(khri brgyad): me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to// gser dang dngul gyi me tog dag na mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// chos gos dang / go si rin
354a1(khri brgyad): tshe dag kyang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor bar 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / 
354a2(khri brgyad): tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po chos 'phags rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam
354a3(khri brgyad): du sems te/ ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' soda' chen po chos 'phags 'di/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing dri ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi
354a4(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sade'i spyad pa spyod pa yang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dran/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas bci
354a5(khri brgyad): 'dra bar 'gyur snya mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs ba bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub seM ra sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba
354a6(khri brgyad): chen po bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus
354a7(khri brgyad): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyur cig/ byang chub se de'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po
354a8(khri brgyad): chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ bdag cag skems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / 'di lta bu'i chos rnam/ 
354b1(khri brgyad): mngon sum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' seMde' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha
354b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog shig/ byang chub sems dpa' so chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur
354b3(khri brgyad): cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sanga' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing / yong su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du
354b4(khri brgyad): bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la ma khas pa dang ldan zhing yong su rdzogs par sheg shig/ ces smra'o// de nas byang chub se der seda' chen po rtag tu
354b5(khri brgyad): dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub se de'i sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
354b6(khri brgyad): la yang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub senga'i sanga' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
354b7(khri brgyad): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sede'i sanga' chen po rtag tu ngus/ 'di skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu 'di
354b8(khri brgyad): yang bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyog su sa nga shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par
355a1(khri brgyad): 'gyu ro// zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba der log su mchis nas/ 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gi sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar
355a2(khri brgyad): bgyi su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur pa ma driso snyam ste/ des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin
355a3(khri brgyad): mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas/ zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ji srid mchi ba
355a4(khri brgyad): bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las gnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur sgra de la ma dris snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs/ 
355a5(khri brgyad): shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsung // rigs kyi bu/ khyad 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya song dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de ni/ byang chub seder sed chen po chos
355a6(khri brgyad): 'phags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyu ro zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshi/ gas pa'i sku gzugs de las/ bdag gis 'di thos nas ji
355a7(khri brgyad): ltar btams pa bzhin du/ shar phyogs ga la ba de log su zhugs te/ mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu/ bdag
355a8(khri brgyad): la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nas
355b1(khri brgyad): ma bskyod par khyod las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tho so// de nyan pa na ting 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sangs
355b2(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad/ rigs kyi bu leg so sogs// khyod kyi ting 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la
355b3(khri brgyad): gnas pas da kyis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs rdzogs par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag sa shin tu legs par bston nas mi snang bar gyur
355b4(khri brgyad): te/ bdag kyang ting 'dzin de las langs nas/ 'dis ma du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga nga nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du gzhudang snya ma
355b5(khri brgyad): de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ bya nga chub sems dpa' seM 'a chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa
355b6(khri brgyad): ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
355b7(khri brgyad): pade dge gang du bzhud pa/ de bdag la ston par 'gyu ro snyam nas rigs kyi khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du
355b8(khri brgyad): bzhung ba bdag 'dren ci nas/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa 'tshal cing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar de bzhinag
356a1(khri brgyad): pade dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshadu gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ rtag par rab tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/ brgyad
356a2(khri brgyad): cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMng chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub seng sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la
356a3(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byin gang du yang ma bzhud/ de nyid las ma g.yas so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
356a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'o
356a5(khri brgyad): pa 'am/ 'gro ba med/ yang dag pa'i mtho' gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med/ stong pa
356a6(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la/ 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs
356a7(khri brgyad): pa'o/  rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la/ 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med// 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa
356a8(khri brgyad): la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu na mkha'i khams la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med/ na mkha'i khams
356b1(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
356b2(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhini nyid cig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyisu byar med// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 
356b3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam/ gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi nyi mas gdungs pas/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la/ nyi ma gung
356b4(khri brgyad): gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/ da ra chub tungo zhes de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems te/ chu de gang nas 'ongs/ gang
356b5(khri brgyad): du song / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu ngus smras pa/ 
356b6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu smig rgya la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba gang la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu mi nyi mas gdungs shing / byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i
356b7(khri brgyad): rang bzhin can gyis/ smig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la/ chur 'du shes bskyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchi so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
356b8(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gabye
357a1(khri brgyad): pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa rtog pa de dag thang ni/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab
357a2(khri brgyad): 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/ dper na/ mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes skyed pa bzhi no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste/ de
357a3(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa ma
357a4(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper ni sgyu ma sprul pa grang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tsho gas sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la/ 'ong ba 'a
357a5(khri brgyad): 'gro ba med/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshe gas pa'i sku la 'ang byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa medo/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log
357a6(khri brgyad): pa'i rmi lam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu
357a7(khri brgyad): de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon
357a8(khri brgyad): gang du bzhud/ rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi ganga'o// rmi lam ni rdzun te yang dag pa ma lags// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rig
357b1(khri brgyad): kyi bu de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsung so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thang rmi lam lte bu ba dang
357b2(khri brgyad): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par mi shes pa de dag ni/ ming dang mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas/ de bzhin ga
357b3(khri brgyad): pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzung bar 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba 'gro ba drug par
357b4(khri brgyad): dong ba/ 'dong ba 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring
357b5(khri brgyad): du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos tham sa cad rmi lam lta bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o// zhes yang dag par
357b6(khri brgyad): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan par shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog/ gang dag chos nyid la yang 'ong ba 'am
357b7(khri brgyad): 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid rab tu she so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyi du rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ 
357b8(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par mi rtog/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
358a1(khri brgyad): byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos de dag ni/ yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don
358a2(khri brgyad): yod par za ste/ de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnaso// rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ong
358a3(khri brgyad): lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / stang dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ san de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen
358a4(khri brgyad): bo'i nang nas rin po che dag byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu mi dang par 'byung ba ma yin mod kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen dang / gzhi la rag las pa yin ste/ brtan nas byung // rin po che
358a5(khri brgyad): de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gong du yang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyen de dag yod na/ rin po che de ga rab tu 'byed// rkyen de dag med na rin po che dag rab tu
358a6(khri brgyad): dbya ba yang med par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa yang / gang nas kyang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma
358a7(khri brgyad): bzhud// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa yang ma yin te/ sngon spyod pas yongasu grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/ sngon gyi phrin las rnam par
358a8(khri brgyad): smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin// de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub par yang mi snang// rigs kyi bu
358b1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste dper na pi wang gi sgra byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro// gang du yang mi 'pho ste/ brten nas 'byung ba/ rgyu la rag las/ 
358b2(khri brgyad): las rag las pa'o// 'di lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bul brten/ rgyud rten la bcan/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba sa
358b3(khri brgyad): brten nas/ bi wang de las sgra byung ste/ sgra de lang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma
358b4(khri brgyad): byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra me byung mod kyi/ de dag tha~Mng 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la/ sgra de 'gag pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs
358b5(khri brgyad): kyo bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongasu 'grub pa yang / rgyu la rag las pa/ na la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas/ yongasu grub
358b6(khri brgyad): pa yin te// rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba tsog gis/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa lang ma yin// rgyu
358b7(khri brgyad): rkyen mang po tshogs pa las 'byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas ma byon te// rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang / gang du yang mi bzhud/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin ga
358b8(khri brgyad): po de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ster blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khye
359a1(khri brgyad): gang tshun chad/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang
359a2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa'i
359a3(khri brgyad): bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen por 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug du g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab
359a4(khri brgyad): tu g.yos// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing spa skong par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
359a5(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams ni/ rdza dang / gang gas ba dang / nags pa dza~M pAde yo ba de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags gal ba der logs
359a6(khri brgyad): su rab tu 'dud par gyur to// dus ma yin pa'i me tog kyang steng gi bar snang las 'gror zhing / me tog gi cha rad kyang bab po// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang
359a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gis 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing / tshig 'di skad
359a8(khri brgyad): ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang / don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ gang 'jig tshogs la gnas thams cad
359b1(khri brgyad): ma yin pa bstan pa thos zhes 'dzer to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ 'di ska
359b2(khri brgyad): ces smraso// rigs kyi bu sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di/ rgya gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byin
359b3(khri brgyad): ma bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas/ srog chags brgyad khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dag/ khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu/ bla na mngapa
359b4(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri ba ni stong / chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam par gyur pa
359b5(khri brgyad): phyi ro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe na po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
359b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pa/ sems can 'di rnyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa
359b7(khri brgyad): legs par rnyed// 'di nyid kyis bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
359b8(khri brgyad): la phyir the tsom mi bya'o// bdag ni the tsom med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyur snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang / 
360a1(khri brgyad): bde dang ldan pas/ ta la bdun tsam du/ na mkha' la 'phags nas/ ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag na mkhal 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
360a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du sem so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon
360a3(khri brgyad): par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/ de la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis/ byang chub sem
360a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod yongasu bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus/ srog chags stong phrag ma
360a5(khri brgyad): ngo'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can gyi phyi/ ri ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur/ bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems
360a6(khri brgyad): can de dag ni/ rnyed par dka'o zhes smraso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub
360a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags la gau tor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bdag gis lus kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
360a8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkag ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu dang slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang / zham ring bgyi ba'i sladu/ bdag gi lus
360b1(khri brgyad): khyod la dgu 'o// des bdag gis lus phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun tu thal po sbyar te 'dug/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dag
360b2(khri brgyad): 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rdul 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang
360b3(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bkur
360b4(khri brgyad): stir bgyid/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o//  nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gya bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smra so// bu
360b5(khri brgyad): mo dag khyed/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas gan sa par byed na/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas pa ngag nyid byin cig dang bu mo khyod kho bos bla // bu mo de dag
360b6(khri brgyad): gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsum pa thag pa nas/ khyod kyi rje su 'thun par 'jug/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas/ ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bu'o// da dang bya
360b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo lo sogs po bum lda rgya de dag/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lbu ban+d+ha rang ban+d+han nA
360b8(khri brgyad): de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag kyang longasu longs spyad pa'i phyir khyi
361a1(khri brgyad): la 'bu'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// rigs kyi bu de la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu leg so lag so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa
361a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po dag gis/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtang bar bya'o// yongasu gtong ba'i sems de lta bus/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
361a3(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de
361a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu'i gtong pa/ 
361a5(khri brgyad): la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongasu dris// / 
361a6(khri brgyad): de nas byang chub sedar sadang chen po chos 'phags kyis// tshong dpon byi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub seng soda' chen po rtag tu
361a7(khri brgyad): du'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas/ rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu le byin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sade'i chen po chos 'phags stan las
361a8(khri brgyad): langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang / nyi ma nub par gyur nas/ de nas byang chub seda' sems dpa' tshon po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar bdag
361b1(khri brgyad): chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni/ bdag gi mchil 'di ni ma legs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
361b2(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o su mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
361b3(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin grangs med pag tu med pa dag dang
361b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul/ lo bdun gyis
361b5(khri brgyad): bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi rto ga pa ma byung / rnam par 'che ba'i rtog pa ma byung // bro la brkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems
361b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rig
361b7(khri brgyad): kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi/ legs par byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs
361b8(khri brgyad): gtor te/ si phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'bag so shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur
362a1(khri brgyad): ba der legs par byug par bya'o snyamo// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
362a2(khri brgyad): tu ngu'i rjesu slob cing / smod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rje su 'jug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
362a3(khri brgyad): lha'i sgra thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting 'dzin 'di las ljong te/ langs nas grong khyer kyi dbus su 'dug ste/ chos
362a4(khri brgyad): ston par 'gyu ro zhes grags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu li rangs rab tu mgu zhing / 
362a5(khri brgyad): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes to// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa
362a6(khri brgyad): bsham so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phudade/ stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur
362a7(khri brgyad): ba der bting // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ sa phyogs der chag cha ga gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang
362a8(khri brgyad): bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu / chu ma rnyed nas ling mi dga' zhing / sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du gyur pa dang / 
362b1(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/ kun tu chu 'tshol na chu ma rnyed// de nas byang chub sems
362b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag gang po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul cha
362b3(khri brgyad): ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog ni mi rung na/ bdag gis lus gdon mi za bar
362b4(khri brgyad): 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni sgra'i/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi
362b5(khri brgyad): lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnasu zhig pa ni tsaur yang ma rungasnya mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshan rnon po blangs
362b6(khri brgyad): te bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khra ga gis sa phyogs de khor lug tu chag chag bta ba bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
362b7(khri brgyad): du'i rjesu slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya do dag thams cad kyis kyang / mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang rang gi khrag gis
362b8(khri brgyad): sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i blags rnyed par mi 'gyur bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
363a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa mang// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
363a2(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu ngu 'di/ 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yid dam la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi rtsa
363a3(khri brgyad): ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
363a4(khri brgyad): nasang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las/ sa mas can thar par bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam du sem so// de nas
363a5(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khrag de dag thams cad lha 'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlab so// lha'i tsan dan gi chu de'i dri dam pa/ rgya ba bsam gyis mi khyab
363a6(khri brgyad): pas/ sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug du/ dpag tshad brgya tsam gyis bar dris khyab po// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
363a7(khri brgyad): tu du la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu legaso lag so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo// khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongasu tshol ba bla na mdo// rigs
363a8(khri brgyad): kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dedag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / 
363b1(khri brgyad): chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems
363b2(khri brgyad): te bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi bstan btings phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas/ chag chag ni btab na/ bdag gi gang dag
363b3(khri brgyad): gis rdzas phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor ba bya ba dang / me tog de dag gang nas rnyed
363b4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur snyam du sems// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byi na gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu lha'i ma
363b5(khri brgyad): tog man dA rab 'di dag long la/ khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag du me tog bkram par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
363b6(khri brgyad): chos ston cing sang+ge'i khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces/ des de la lha'i me tog man da ra ba khal stong byin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
363b7(khri brgyad): tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni// sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byaso// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
363b8(khri brgyad): 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen mtshas 'phags mo bdun 'das pa dang / ting 'dzin dmas sas te/ chos kyi stan gangan mang
364a1(khri brgyad): pa der 'ongs nas sman bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston
364a2(khri brgyad): de nas byang chub sems dpa' senga' chen po rtag tu ngus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gtan
364a3(khri brgyad): gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du/ bde ba de lta bu thob po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phagra
364a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid// chos thams cad dben pa
364a5(khri brgyad): nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nga ben pa nyid// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid// 
364a6(khri brgyad): chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyi do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha
364a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/ 
364a8(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid bya/ 
364b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid// na mkha' mu med pa nyid pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas/ shas ra
364b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid// na mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi
364b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa rtag pa med pa nyid// gzugs mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
364b4(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid// sa 'i khams mu med pa nyid las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
364b5(khri brgyad): mu med pa nyid// chu'i khams dang / me'i kha mas dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid// na mkha'i khams
364b6(khri brgyad): mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid// chos tham
364b7(khri brgyad): cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid// chos thams cad dmig su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmag su med pa
364b8(khri brgyad): nyidang chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid
365a1(khri brgyad): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyi
365a2(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i
365a3(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sem
365a4(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro cig pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos
365a5(khri brgyad): thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin da nga / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba 'i ti nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya
365a6(khri brgyad): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / na mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / 
365a7(khri brgyad): nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
365a8(khri brgyad): mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ti
365b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin dang / 
365b2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmig su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
365b3(khri brgyad): byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
365b4(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu dus do la grags pa ti 'dzin gyi sgro dun phrag drug cu thob par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po khri brgyad stong pa las/ 
365b5(khri brgyad): 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o// // rab 'byor byang chub sems
365b6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ tinge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bram phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 
365b7(khri brgyad): phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma stong dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
365b8(khri brgyad): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs kyis bdun gyis bltas te/ tshul 'di lta bu nyid
366a1(khri brgyad): dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da lta stong
366a2(khri brgyad): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis
366a3(khri brgyad): bltas nas/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhi no// de nang du thos pa bsami gyis mi
366a4(khri brgyad): khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du yang / sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to// skye ba thams cad du yang
366a5(khri brgyad): gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rna mas mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam du rang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
366a6(khri brgyad): ngag dang mi 'bral bar gyur te/ des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs/ dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrub so// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang / shes rab
366a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
366a8(khri brgyad): de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
366b1(khri brgyad): spyad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yangs
366b2(khri brgyad): bzung ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig/ rmongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ 
366b3(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ga gis/ mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar
366b4(khri brgyad): baglag par bya/ kun chub par bya// gdon par bya/ lung nod par bya/ bsta na par bya/ kha don du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
366b5(khri brgyad): byin gyis brlabs kyis/ glegs baman po la/ yi ge bsal zhing rab tu gsal ba/ legs par bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 
366b6(khri brgyad): byig pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug du/ mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchong ba rnam pa mang pos// bku
366b7(khri brgyad): sngar bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya// mchod par bya/ rjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni de'i gang ma ngag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo rje
366b8(khri brgyad): snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa len nam/ kun dga' bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa
367a1(khri brgyad): bdag gi ston pa lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/ 'di skad ces bka'
367a2(khri brgyad): stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi lus kyi las byams pa yid 'ong ba dang / ngag gis las byams pa yi du 'ong ba
367a3(khri brgyad): dang / yid kyi las byams pa yi du 'ong bas/ rim gro byaso// kun dga' bo de lta bso na/ da ltar bzhug so te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la/ khyod kyis phangs dang / 
367a4(khri brgyad): dad pa dang / gus par byas pa bzhin du nga 'das nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ci nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha
367a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha ma rom 'gyur bar/ khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yo su gtang // rjes
367a6(khri brgyad): longasu ga tango // kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ 'jig rten du ji srid spyod pa/ de sri du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun
367a7(khri brgyad): dga' bo de sri du/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 
367a8(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / ston pa dang / kha don du byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / 
367b1(khri brgyad): bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / khar lug du/ 
367b2(khri brgyad): ma'i 'phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed
367b3(khri brgyad): pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim 'gro byed pa dang ma bral bar rig
367b4(khri brgyad): bar bya'o// kun dga' bo// sems can de ngag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de skad ces
367b5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
367b6(khri brgyad): bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka te lan tshon
367b7(khri brgyad): po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ni ma gru dang // tshe dang ldan po sgra can zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
367b8(khri brgyad): dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jog rten yi rangs te
